review: This app is great! But I have a suggestion. It would be great if rather than searching for flights from specific cities/airports, I have the option to search for flights all airports in a specific area. For example, I live in Philly but I am more than willing to drive to EWR, JFK, IAD etc if those airports have a better deal. Being able to search airports within 100 miles of where I am would be a game changer.

Upon updating the app, it appears that a lot of the previously removed functionality has been returned to the app. Estimated prices in the date window are back, although somewhat less expansive that I would hope (and fewer than appear using google flights). The bar graph view is not here though, which is disappointing. The explore feature doesn't feel streamlined and feels a little too "curated" for my liking. Estimated prices for suggested travel cities don't show up in the explore page.

The latest version as of 25DEC2020 is absolute garbage. Can't search a range of dates, can't find an option to search anything other than one way, and can no longer even get a price on the month view, just a series of colored dots with no explanation of what they represent. This is a classic case of trying to fix what isn't broken. This is a garbage update that I am proud to say will drive me to uninstalling unless it's reverted and never looking back. I've used this app since 2012/13, no more.

The New View is Terrible! Primarily for esthetics and functionality, please return to the previous format. Feels like an MS-DOS search. This was the best app for finding destinations. Part of the selection process involved seeing pictures of the destinations/prices and plugging in timeframes based on that. Now you dont see any of those things. Takes you straight to a calender??? The whole purpose of the app is to not HAVE to choose a date for your vacation.

Years ago, I found great flights on this app. I travel US to Europe. Now, all the cheapest providers that pop up are some BS companies nobody has ever heard of, with lots of negative reviews. No thank you. This app is now nothing but a waste of time. Uninstalling. Here's a tip: Every time I have flown for the last twenty years or so, Expedia has had the best deals and I booked through them. (For me, it's regular flights, no hotel or car, no last minute or standby.) Always a great experience.

Out dated App. I used to use this as my go to flight search for booking overseas. I would promote it with my family and friends for years. Then this past year- year n half it's gone downhill. It claims I can get a flight for X amount when I click to book suddenly doubles or triples in price. Never did that before. I don't trust it anymore and honestly have just been using other mainstream apps since those work. Gave up after the mainstream ones gave better deals. Sorry Sky scanner.

Horrible, horrible app. App going down the drain since last few years. Can't even set "Departing From" other than your specific location? What happens if you're checking flights for your parents or someone's else by using a different city to depart from and not your current location? App becomes totally useless. Also, a me of the vendors listed in the the search results are bunch of scammer. Horrible, horrible app.

Skyscanner used to be the only place I'd even look for flights (after lot sof experience of it being the best every time I compared results) but the redesign they did, I guess in the last year is awful. All the good filtering options are gone. It's slow and confusing,l. I literally can't even figure out what currency it's showing me prices for. It's completely awful now and I don't know how this got approved to be done.

This app is really convenient until you find out that they charge different people different prices for no reason. Any flight my girlfriend searches will have a list of flight prices and times. When I search the EXACT SAME FLIGHTS I am charged at least 200 more and at least 10 hours more of travel. I've tried to contact these people but their phone number is very well hidden. I do not know why I am being over charged for the exact same flights or why my searches do not yield the same results.

Could be a good app but the prices on my saved trips doesn't update & hasn't since I created them. Everytime I open the app, it shows the same price from 30 days ago. I don't see any feature to refresh it other than clicking into the trip & hitting check prices. Even after doing so, the price on the trip page still reflects 30 days ago. I thought the app would automatically refresh the prices on the saved trip page without having to click into it. Uninstalled.

Fantastic app. The UI is clean and the filters are unusually powerful for a mobile app. My only complaint is that I wish the desktop site showed the plane type and features the same way the app does. I like to fly larger planes if possible, so knowing if my flight legs are going to be on a 737 or a 777 matters to me, and that isn't something I can see on the desktop website.

Really good app idea but everytime it shows me a low flight price in the explore section and then I click on it, the actual price is much more expensive which makes it pretty much useless... Also, it would be nice if I could select flexible dates. For example, I could select the start date and end date of my spring break and then have it show me all the cheapest flights within those dates whether it be a 3 day trip, 5 day trip, or a trip for the whole week.

the app has evolved away from what attracted me to it many years ago. I used to enjoy planning my vacations with the graph pricing feature. it made my decisions easy and affordable. the apps current interface is more limited and confusing. will probably seek other options since prices are relative and ease of discovery and purchase are my most important concerns.

I don't review often but I have to say after traveling to Greece, Georgia, Florida, and California using this app, I am one happy consumer. This may be the best app I've ever used for a few reasons. - Shows you a list of all flight combinations with specific parameters or within a time range. Filter is easy to use. - You can save a search and than save that specific trip. and it will actually notify you when the price changes. - Doesn't save your info to price gouge. 10/10 on the appüëç

So as a person who loves to travel and always travels on a budget, there's better apps and websites out there. I mostly use Expedia because they offer packages. I always travel alone (which is always pricier) but I wanted to compare prices for a trip to Dublin,Ireland for Dec 2019. Same days, same airlines,same hotel and car rental. Skyscanner was 500 dollars more than what Expedia offered. Just do your research and happy travels! üòÅ

Went from the best app to use for finding cheap flights to finding the most expensive flights. 12k to fly across the country in economy. Not when I did the leg work and found the same on a different site for less than 400. Cant find out the cheapest day to fly out anymore. Some of us travel for fun.. well now you've taken out how to plan an efficient vacation and making it more leg work. I've now uninstalled this app due to the issues that have happened.

Unbelievable! The dev team actually implemented a feature I requested. Previously, the app didn't show the date of arrival at your destination when searching for flights. This is important when flying across different time zones. I posted a review and sent them an email and they promised to do it. I'm really thankful to them. Best travel app ever.

I've used this app twice now and got mixed results. The 1st time was excellent. Got a round trip ticket last year no problem. This year I've tried to book and both times I get an error message. I called the airline and was told on 2 different occasions that those flights are sold out and that's why after I submit my payment that it gets kicked out. Why wouldn't Skyscanner know that flights are unavailable and why wait until you've already submitted payment? Won't use this app again.

Hate it!! Go back to the way it was!! I LOVED it because we could filter by cheapest month and no other site does that! Well NOW you don't either! The site went from number 1 to useless! I used it EVERY TIME I planned to travel, just went to South Korea using this! Now it is junk!! Please restore that feature! People need to stop trying to fix things that aren't broken! Give us the old one back please!!

very competitive rates and the app is easy to navigate. I like getting updates sent to my phone home screen when there is a price drop. I like how the details of each flight are given and it is noted if a self transfer must occur between airports. the self transfer actually saves you quite a bit of money on flights with one or more stops.

This used to be an essential part of my trip planning. The feature that set them apart from other aggregators was the map graph. You could see the pricing options and decide when to depart and when to return based on that. A powerful tool! It went from being the default view, to an option that you had to turn on, to now removed. They have forgotten their roots and what made them special. Now they are trying to compete with the other aggregations. There isn't any extra reason now to use it

I've always enjoyed this App & prices are nearly always available that it lists. My only complaint is about the limitations of the search everywhere feature because it gives me tons of U.S. cities because obviously they are cheaper than Itnl flts. This is annoying because I want an Intl Destination. The Best & Easiest Fix is to offer search by Continent or Region like: Europe, Asia, Africa, Australia, Pacific Islands, S. America & N. America, etc. This would really help save Time & Money!

This is said to be the best travel search engine but the functionality is horrible. (A) half the time the SET PRICE ALERT button doesn't appear anywhere & (B) on my homescreen there's a "4" in a red circle on Skyscanner's app which I assume means I have 4 messages but I can't find any way to retrieve them. There's no msg button! This is frustrating when you're competition (Kayak and Hopper) always function flawlessly 100% of the time. (PLS REPLY HERE. IF U SEND A MSG IN THE APP I CAN'T OPEN). TY

Why strip away all the features that made Skyscanner an excellent app? Years ago, Skyscanner was intuitive, informative, streamlined, interactive, and flexible. You could easily select "nearby airports" to view alternatives; "flexible dates" to show better fares near your search dates, or "view entire month" to see all known fares for each day within a month. You could set filters for flight duration, number of stops, airlines, and price. All of these features are gone. Skyscanner is dead.

Horrific in the US... I first learned about this app through my travels in Asia and have to say it has saved me time and money on that continent. However, in the US when I search for flights I only get the "major" carriers and very few if not, none of the budget carriers show up in the search. I just saved $120 on RT flights by NOT using this app

This used to be a great app that lets you explore the cheapest flights across a wide range of locations and potential dates. It allowed you to plan a flight date and location around the cheapest option. Now the app has reduced functionality, only allowing you to enter predetermined dates and locations to search for tickets. Skyscanner, what happened?!?

it was better before the update. The good thing its that now it will search roundtrip and give you results from different airlines, I use to search flights just one way to go and return so in that way I was able to find the best deals from differents airlines. The best thing from the old app was the scale graphic of prices per date now you just have the option to look in the calendar instead of this way

I tried Skyscanner and found it not very good.  Plugged in a roundtrip from Local City to Washington Dulles.  Matched its results against Expedia.  This is where everything failed.  Came up with different prices and had to go way down the list to find my outgoing flight. Selected it and then return screen would only show me the same airline coming back.  Pricing was $150 higher then Expedia directly.  Seems with this scenario, it will only show same airline going and returning which in the real world is not always the cheapest fair and cheap price is not always cheapest to fly.  You have to take also into consideration now baggage fees and flight times

This is one of those rare situations where the app is inferior to the mobile website. While it is a pain in the butt to continue going to the website each time I want to use this service, I find the app clunky and simply not as functional. The website allows you to search flights by month and see prices for each day during that month. This app only allows viewing prices by color (red for high) similar to other flight apps such as kayak. I will continue using the website and uninstall the app.

Prices jump if you check too many times. Edit: I realized that the issue is that the advertised price isn't consistent with the price that you're given when proceeding through the app. For instance, London to Corfu, Greece is advertised as 55 pounds. Once I click and it searches for the round trip, the price jumps to 85 pounds per person while still in the app.

I decided to go to a different rental car company (N√º) and different app (Expedia) because they took 1,000+ on an unauthorized charge. I decided to use Skyscanner, I found economy bookings, who uses the rent plus counter at the prague Airport. Without my consent, N√º came back to be refusing my request for the full refund with the contract I had through economybookings. I am very disappointed in Skyscanner and Expedia for being this irresponsible.

**Edit ** AWESOME update, devs! I was literally just wishing for the ability to find the best dates to fly back to visit family. I already love the explore anywhere feature, and Skyscanner regularly catches deals that other apps don't. I recommend this app to anyone who loves to travel, and with your newest addition I can recommended it to people who grew up elsewhere and fly home. I've had this app for years and it's awesome.

Skyscanner was recommended to me but I couldn't figure out what the big deal was. Functioned just like any other travel app. It gave very specific dates even on the full month search (which was very hard to find btw). Instead of giving up I watched recent YouTube reviews. The positive ones only review the website. Turns out this app is lacking the main functionality of website - the month feature that shows all dates' prices in a calendar. Game changer. Not in this app at all only on site. Dumb.

Searching is difficult. I specifically want to search flights without set dates. I know it can be done, but it's difficult to get to. Nothing in support to help. OH, and my "trip type" is not even an option, it only goes up to 7 days, I want 10. Basically, the search options for what I'm trying to find don't actually exist in this app.

I loved this app for years. Since the recent update I find that's its much harder to use and more difficult to find the cheapest flights possible. What happened to the estimate price on the calendar or the bar graph with estimate prices. The older format was a lot more functional. Bring it back.

What happened to the explore option? If you wanted to find a cheap flight to anywhere, you used to be able to filter by worldwide, by cheapest month, cheapest days etc. All this is gone. It's now just a simple a flight from X airport to X airport. This is terrible. I have to go to the desktop version to use the fully functional Skyscanner

I love this app. However, recently, when I choose explore everywhere and select a month, it won't go forward to the search. It reverts to the explore everywhere page on my android device. This feature has worked before though, so I have no doubt this glitch will be quickly fixed. The dev team for this app seems to be top notch.

I've gone through most reviews made about this app and support the comments. You select dates and find good deals, once you click roundtrip only, flight search results return crazy prices for one way.What happens to the good deals showing before one makes a choice of dates? Searching flights incognito doesn't help in anyway as the app still lets cookies track and alter your preferences.

Not all the features of the website, but still useful and handy. Try a spontaneous trip by putting in your home airport and no destination. Go where it sounds interesting and cheap. I've seen a couple great things on a long weekend or two that way that I wouldn't have normally.

interactions arent as expected, features in mobile and web are different and/or missing. data pulled for save trip (before booking) isn't accurate, makes the save trips feature unusable. overall, looking for flights is easy but don't expect to save any of the trips for future research or comparison because data isn't accurate or can't pull any data

The platform is quick and easy to use however where it becomes very difficult is the indicated values for "flights from..." shown with each date. These never exist in reality and are usually in fact way off. As cost is the method most of us want to search by it makes it very frustrating and difficult due to the vast difference between what the app shows and is then available when you view tickets for each date. This makes the benefit of the apps date overviews essentially useless

I'm no longer receiving updates, defeating the purpose of my use for this app. I have had to manually check the app multiple times as I'm suddenly not receiving notifications anymore. I've checked the settings, my phone has all notifications enabled and the option is ticked inside the app. The tickets for my trip have gone up or down with no updates. Considering just deleting the app and manually checking the provider directly since it would be more reliable.

Earlier I would give you 10* but now you are at strong 3*. The reasons are I miss a lot the price list for almost every date in axmonth in following year (now it's available only for 3-4 in advance) and the 2nd thing is the other way of choosing dates for travel,with charts/sticks. That was helping me a lot to plan all my vacations a to travel more ... Now all the apps are the same:(

We booked the flight ticket through HappyFares, assuming that Skyscanner had done the due diligence. We received the tickets (PNR: YJQ8SH; SG-430) with correct passengers‚Äô details. When we reached the airport there was a mistake in my name (total 3 from my family). Due to the name difference, I did not get the boarding pass while two of my family members took the boarding pass. I was told by the agent to book the ticket and they would refund it. However, we are not even getting reply on email.

This app is very easy and usefull to check flights, I have used it to book 2 flights now, but recently it shows self transfer and no self transfer for same flights time to time, I have booked a batik to batik transit via KUL from CMB to HKG on Oct 10 2023, next Tuesday, FLIGHT result on this app clearly showed no self transfer when I'm booking. And I checked it with 3 separate people to verify no self tranfer, NOW after several hours of payment it shows self transfer in app, I'm so lost now ü§¶üôé

I have booked a round trip fr 3 pax but havent received any conformation emial or watsapp even after the payment deduction from my bank account to interglobe aviation ltd as mentioned on the UPI request. Kindly upgrade your app n contact me as your contact no is not mentioned. Hoping to get a quick reply from your end. My flight is within 2 days

Really wish Skyscanner realised that allowing customers to add 'direct flights only' at the *beginning* of a search would be very useful and save searchers loads of time. Who wants a 2 hour flight that takes 30 hours with 1,2,3,4 stops - just ridiculous, but as usual Skyscanner never listen to customers and the reviews given by genuine users. Would rather see the price for direct flights NOT cheap multi stop flights.
There is a bug when saving a multi-city flight. It is saved as a return flight, where the second city gets replaced with the first city, so the flight becomes invalid when you review it.

Doesn't have any record of the bookings and partners. You can be cheated by any provider. I am trying to change the booking but no contact for the service provider. Really unprofessional. I booked flight tickets on Oct 02 now I wish to change my booking but Indigo is asking to do it with your booking partner. Now I have no access to my booking on Skyscanner and no mail from the booking partner. So I have no clue whom to reach.
The new update messed up the whole experience. Earlier we were able to see multiple options of round trip of flights for a month. Now just 1 shows

Lots of people around me suggested this app,I thought to give it a try.I regret that decision because this app doesn't work at first place. When you search for flights you get to know where to where and it's price but when you click on particular option it doesn't show any results.
I hate the new version, not convenient at all. When you just download it, it works well, but changes to a new version soon, very difficult to be used.
Constantly throws error while searching for the complete list of flights. Needs to be fixed ASAP as this is serving no purpose Edit: this is working as expected now, thank you

Fraud app. Travel Date automatic change while payment..... Book carefully.. if u want video proof then ask me i will show u... Book ticket with geniune way otherwise ready for harras... There is no any contact number for this app..
Prices in the app are 3 times higher than on the website since about 6 months. It looks like a bug, deinstalled.
Problem is they link to sites like edreams which are just scam sites. As long as they do they should just change the name to Skyscammer I was left stranded.

Skyscanner has been a really useful app until recently when they appeared to remove the feature which told you whether a checked bag was included or not in the price of each flight in your search results. Now, this does not appear. Useful data, removed for no apparent reason. I see they are very responsive to constructive criticism so I'm hoping someone sees this and reverts this terrible change! ///// Update: I will watch and hope that this feature is added back again as they suggest!
the price increased by about $6 when I went to pay it, without any reason I could find. not impressed at all !!

My son said me for this app! I am so satifadeI'm so happy with it! I just used it and I'm so happy with the flight I found Belgrade-Chicago! I am satisfied with the price and other conditions that she offered me. I wish all the best to the Skyscanner company employees in the coming holidays and even better results! Merry Christmas from me and Happy New Year dear friends‚ù§Ô∏èüòá‚ù§Ô∏èüíï!!!

Basics missing. 1. There is no sync in estimated vs actual price. Shows 12k on calender but starts with 25k on actual results. Then while booking the flights, price moves to 30k. What's the point? 2. Why cant I filter our the direct flights on initial search, all aggregators give this basic option. 3. No option to filter out self transfer flights on app, such wierd & tacky flight combinations. 4. Price alert option is useless.
A great service delivered by a great App, plus, if you tell them about a bug, they get straight in touch, and fix it! Thanks Scott.
Very good app in finding trip tickets at discounted rates and real time alerts when price drops. Life saver.
I have been happily and successfully using Skyscanners for over a decade now, simply because it is the best flight application available. Excellent. Many thanks.

I booked through make my trip a flight from dubai to cairo and due to emergency i was obliged to cancel my ticket and when i request a refund they inform me the my ticket is not Refundable. This total loss for me i trusted skyscanner agencies, and this really forced me to stop using skyscanner anymore.
Used to be the best app to find cheapest connection, now I cannot see prices in monthly view. Really bad decision to remove that function.
A very useful platform for looking for flights tickets. Love using it because the platform has always been giving me a very good results.
Such a great app. But lately Skyscanner did not send me the updated price anymore through my email, which means I have to check manually. Can you please solve this problem. Thank you
really like this apps. easy to find the cheap tickets. every single minutes open to checking the which countries are cheap ticketüòÑ

WHY DOES THE WEEK START ON SUNDAY?! Why can't it be changed? So confusing, I almost booked the wrong dates because of that! I wrote about it a year ago and you told me you'd tell the development team - well, where is the change?

Terrible App.... Sack the development manager and team.... Plus anyone else who had anything to do with developing and testing of this useless piece of software and thought that it was fit for purpose and suitable for release.
Has not been the same since they removed the cheapest flight search.....even with the new fly anytime search......not the same.
I love Skyscanner, it helps me find the best flight options, it's fast and free and finds connections Google Flights doesn't. Thank you for providing this service!

You have been warrned Do not use online flight booking via Skyscanner/Travelist as they most likely double book your flight, charge you and then cancel your booking because it is double booked. It is over two months that I am trying to contact their customer service with no luck.I have sent numerous email and I keep getting automatic reply email that, they will respond within 7days but this is not true at all. I used the airline booking service directly without error, confident and informative

I am giving 1 star to get some traction on feature requests. Can you please add a feature to blocklist a set of airlines, so that it doesn't show up in result? For example: I don't want to trips with China Airlines. Another feature is to have the ability to filter out flights with "Self transfer" requirements.

Skyscanner works perfectly on my computer but I can't use it on my phone. Every time I want to edit the date of my return flight the app changes the first flight to the same date as the return!! It's maddening. Also my filters switch back to my previous choice so I need to adjust them again after every selection I get. I have to give 1 star to publish this otherwise it would be zero. Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 Pro. On my Redmi Note 8 Pro every search stops near completion wth connection problems.

just downloaded it, and it's immediately so unhelpful. trying to explore flights from Atlanta to literally any airport in Mexico, and it says no flights available... seems to not work for trips longer than a week. renders the explore feature completely useless.

Used to love this app, Skyscanner was always my go to for flights. But now the site for flights is always down saying there's no Wi-Fi connection, but the rest of the app hotels ect works fine. It just won't budge and I don't understand why this happening. I will uninstall and go elsewhere if this carries on

There are several filter options missing. - need an option for global search (e.g UK to everywhere) along with outbound time and inbound time and same airport and direct flight option. ( all in one search - not by country ) contact me if you need more use case details

Stopped working correctly. It will show the dates and prices but when I select those dates the prices are inaccurate and cost way more. Please fix this asap or I will delete the app and relay the problems to any friends using this app. If I choose a $41 departure flight and a $52 return flight the price shouldnt be $159. Get it together Devs!

My name is Priyanka, and today I booked a ticket for my friend through Happy Fares via Skyscanner. I am encountering difficulties as I have not received my ticket, and I am unable to check its status using the provided PNR number.
Great app to use. lots of deals you jist need to look and try different locations and combinations.
Seriously Disappointed! Rate fluctuating multiple searches causes price increase rigged system not showing the cost efficient options as pramoted! Really disappointing!
This application allows me to look for the cheapest places to go within a specific range of dates, this is across all airlines.

There are 2 service providers which make fool of people. BudgetTicket & Happyfares always shows lower prices, but when we go to book ticket suddenly price increases. Always facing same price increase issue with both service providers. Skyscanner is not taking any actions against these service providers.
The new ui with tiles is pretty bad. The last version had the best ui with bigger pictures and bigger tiles. I wish I could dowgrade to the previous version. It was very smooth and user friendly.
Most partners are showing false information, while booking ,rate 90% will differ, sometimes flight as well.
Don't trust this app guys, my money was deducted but flight has not generate, even from the provider agency didnot responding for e-mails,calls. Plz don't choose these appüôè

Good app. Have found amazing deals on this app. But only reason I'm giving this a 2 star is bcs they keep working with BUDGET AIR. BA is a scam. They have scammed me and hundreds of others out of their money. Even if you buy the cancelation protection plan you will spend 5+hours on hold to be disconnected again and again. When you do talk to someone they'll tell you that they can't give you any money back even tho that's the whole point of the plan. This app would be better I'd they dropped them
Always reliable and my first choice when it comes to searching for flights using it for years! Love the sleek and minimalistic interface. Keep it up!
Cannot connect my earbuds. I tried everything on the manual and still cannot connect.
when I booked the ticket through this app I was not delivered the air ticket by there partners so I would say it's worse app to use
flights were confusing like only mention one stop / 2 stop but not telling where.. n not able to search hotel via using landmark
Please add filter for airline loyalty programmes. I may want to see only one world flights for example.

Please and please, I'm urging Skyscanner to stop using Mytrip as an affiliate Travel Agency. They are fraudulent or rather scammers. They are always the first on the list to be displayed when it comes to booking because their charges are the cheapest but in reality, they are fraudsters! Please, stop displaying them as an affiliate travel agencies!

WHY DON'T YOU JUST SHOW A LIVE PRICE FROM BEGINNING! The airfare prices at the beginning very rarely match the price once you get to the end. IF your method of how prices are published from start to finish are consistent all the way throughout the process you would have happy consumers. Eg. Explore (insert country name) price shows $309. Once you click to proceed price is then $338. Then click to providers, price is $362. To then use a reputable agent price is $400 plus extras.
Needs a feature where you can filter on direct flights / number of stops at the beginning when you for example search for everywhere. Now you can only filter this when you have already a destination
easy and very convenience to use this application. Wherever our family fly , we use this apps.

Hey, nice app.. i like the option where you can choose "everywhere" as destination and check cheapest destinations from my country. I'd be happy if there is also an option from "any departure" to a certain destination. That would help me to see from which country/airport i can get cheap to my wish destination. As well it can be improved to chose several dates (not only whole month) but certain dates like from 7-15 July to a certain destination to check the prices

Updated review, the app is about better now, but still loads of weaknesses in it. Looking for flights for October from Vienna to Malaga, the results shows 1 + stops, however luckily I know there are direct flights, then go in and you see the direct flights, pretty useless for anyone who wants direct flights as they may not know
I suppose that it is the talre of the algorithm, but it is frustrating to have fees calculated in the currency of the country you are in when you search...but otherwise I'm very happy with Skyscanner

The app would be perfect if it would be possible to have an option regarding luggages... I travel VERY often and most of time I have holded luggages with me... Now, as concurrence is big and every app is looking to show the cheapest prices, in 95% of cases, the showed price correspond to a price without credit card costs and with only a cabin luggage... Then the problem is that in many cases, it's simply impossible to add holded luggages as option. So, at the end, a waste of time and as result, a direct booking through the airline which makes, of course, Skyscanner ignore that a potential passenger used the site to find the best route, but booking it in a different way... Otherwise, finally the multiciity options is available! ...and it remains also the best app to find a flight...

What's happened? I can't search anymore üòï I select "flights" and the last search is automatically coming up, and I get an error message when trying to enter new details ("looks like we lost you for a second - sorry seems our server dropped you off. Please try again later"). Really disappointed, this was my number 1 flight app for browsing deals, but now I can't even search for one destination üòî

Used to be really good until someone decided to change the layout and make something as simple as searching for a flight a nightmare! It's absolutely shocking now! I've no idea why you changed such a winning formula! Judging by all the other reivews neither does anyone else! Baffling that you thought this layout would be easier to navigate when realistically 2020 has been easier.. l will use other flight sites going forward

The explore features are a great idea, but don't work that well: when selecting "Everywhere" as destination, you cannot select "weekends only". And when you then click on a location and do apply the "weekend" filter, you still get flights departing on Fridays at 8AM. Sorry guys, but I've got a job and can't just browse off at 8AM! Would like a "real weekend" filter that goes from Friday evenings to Sunday evening (I also don't want to leave at 9AM on a Sunday...).

This is the worst app I've used. I spent hours trying to book flights. I tried on phone and PC. One agency constantly says "something went wrong - try new dates" and the other agency takes me all the way to payment but payment never works. I rang one agency and they were quick to tell me I could pay over the phone but the price had gone up $400. On a previous booking I paid for seats in advance which were never provided. There is something up with all this. I have given up on Skyscanner.

Each iteration of Skyscanner's recent improvements across the various systems and devices makes it worse each time. It is a pain to use and I am going elsewhere, after about ten years of dedication to Skyscanner. Sorry it has become so bad. Honest, go back to the 'app' of say 2019 - then it was nice, simple, efficient, extremely helpful/useful and above all else easy to use, especially the choices of flights over a calendar month. Now that has gone. OVERALL, not even in the completion.

I have been using Skyscanner for a couple of years now. They have a great customer care team ready to help you if you are experiencing problems. The application is very easy to go through. You can actually get carried away when searching for flights in the app because it's so responsive to searches, which is great. Also, it works smoothly on every phone I switch to. I certainly recommend it. This is the app that every travel-enthusiast should have.. Thank you creators. Let's travel!!

Very good app overall to get a sense of prices and find a good deal. Filters help a lot to screen out nonsensical flights. But it would be very beneficial if one could select checked baggage and factor that into the price. Often times the prices don't match and I rarely travel with hand luggage only. Also a possibility to have a timeline graph of the changing prices would be informative.

Was perfect before but now unusable. I was easily able to search an entire month and see the best/direct fares for each day..now I am forced to go from one page to another per origin and destination and pick specific dates by click on in a button before waiting to see if there are any direct flights that day... very tacky. They keep replying to bad reviews saying they are constantly working to improve the app, but it's simple. Revert to the old one. A classic case of don't fix what isn't broken

UX is disappointing.. I think it's trying too hard. Better focus on functionality. No matter how many times I try to search by specific dates I keep getting only random suggested dates returned for the next two weeks, one month, the months etc.. Suggestion: know your public! Most people tend to choose specific dates and don't have the liberty to search for any cross-hemisphere travel on random dates, as far as I am aware. Try putting as much effort into UX as seemingly goes into UI and that should get you a bit closer to a functional, maybe even happy use experience!! Good luck!

I do love this app but the new interface is not good. Hard to understand how to select the from and where to locations, or HOW TO SWITCH BETWEEN THEM (is it even possible still?) , hard to understand how to search for a one-way or round-trip, the dates selection is not intuitive at all... The entire month feature has been missed dearly for some times as well. I understand the will to try something new but here it's not intuitive, it frustrates and almost make no sense. Sorry but it's bad.

Why change something that worked so well. The New interface lacks the functionality of the past . Less options, for example Rent a car filters by pr√©f√©rences - less options. The air tickets booking is less convenient , the info presented lacks so many details that used to be on the old options. A classic example that it's so easy to destroy a well achieved accomplishment. If it works very well - don't touch , a golden rule. Bring back the old and steady app

I do not like the new interface layout. All the separate bars to get into the selection of destination, date, departure, I'm missing the overview that the previous interface had. I'm also missing, the bar graph, the selection one-way vs. return, swapping arrival and departure destinations. Not connected to the new interface, but a function I'm missing since airlines started selling tickets without check-in baggage as standard, is an option to search for tickets including check-in bags.

Very disappointed with this update I'm afraid. I love sky scanner. I use it for half a dozen flights a year but will have to use desktop now.... Issue for me is the lack of filters on the initial search so the results come back with 200 or 300 options, most of them with multiple stopovers taking the 3 hour flight I'm looking for up to 35 hours of travel. Almost unusable in this format. Sorry guys.

Latest update is terrible. The possibility to choose flight or car disappear. You are forced to indicate your destination (based on the departure where you are, not always what I need), then the dates and to wait the search of the flight. Only after that, at the very bottom, you can choose to look for cars. Why?...I want to go directly to my needs on the home page!. Please, reload the previous version!. It was very very user friendly!!!

Update: calendar view still doesn't work, and even worse - when you select whole month it shows the cheapest flight in that month, and flights in the next few weeks (from now). So I'm trying to book a flight in September and it only shows me one date. Where's the calendar view with prices? Also,'select month' doesn't always show. I want to see a calendar with prices for each day, irrespective of what I enter in departure and destination and dates selected. That. Was. The. Purpose. Of. This. App.

The app doesn't seem to work via WiFi, I had to switch to data which finally allowed me to select an airport. The prices quoted on the first screen are much cheaper than the real prices on the following screens. It offers you ridiculous multi stop flights first which make a 1 hour flight take over a day if this is a realistic option people want! The UI is hard to use now I've just given up with it. It's such a shame because this used to be a brilliant little app.

Installed the app after a few years of not being able to travel. I used to use it for all my flight search but I have to say I'm disappointed with the development choices made. The core reason for the app was how easy it was to use multiple inputs to help find the best flights, now I have to be way more specific (with dates and locations), which is simply not possible when trying to get to China (in my example). I need to be able to filter at the start on things (such as location of layover)

What the heck did they do to this app in the last update??? It asks where I want to fly to Antalya from and will not change! I even tried resetting the app. Epic fail! I am resigned to using Google flights now. Edit: annoying that the from city box is under the white to city box. To search destination "everywhere" now you have to click on "multi trip" annoying too.

The new version of the app keeps wanting me to "explore"; for example if I search flights for London (Any) to South Africa (Any) I get Capetown and Durban as trip options (No Johannesburg); you then get loads of information, reviews, hotels etc. All unnecessary when trying to book a flight home. I'm sure the old version of the app just gave a list of flights with a mix of airports - no fuss. Can't you keep it simple and have a separate section of the app for your "explore function"?

The app only displays prices in Chinese yuan and I can't find a way to change it. I'm in China it's probably detecting that, but I'm still an American and would be paying in dollars. Very annoying//edit: I added a star after finding the setting, but it's still bad design. Would have been easier to find if it was a gear icon like normal, and why is 'Your Details" in it's own menu as it's all stuff typical of "settings". The UI is more cute than useful

The main reason i have been using your service for years is being able to check the prices for a whole month and also select options for nearby airports and now you seem to have taken these both away. Not only that but the app crashes every time i try and change the travel date. Really dissapointed to have to be writing this review. I hope these features are added again and the bugs are fixed becuase i can imagine alot of people will not be using your service anymore including me.

I agree with previous reviews of the latest update - It's AWFUL!! I often search flights for friends and family who aren't in the same city so I don't want it to assume I want to fly from my closest airport. I also like to plan ahead and want to type in future dates, not have to scroll through months and months of a calender. This was clearly not tested by actual travellers. I'd give it 0/5 if it was possible.

The old search interface is far much better than the new one. Now I can't swap between the origin and the destination easily but have to type both of them everytime I want to swap them. And now the search result are not show timetable of every airline on the top anymore. I have to read all the results and it make me very confused. I don't know why you have to change if it make the app getting worse. So, please bring back the old version.

The new update is terrible. Can't input swop departure/arrival airports. Please put it back to how it was before this update! I have just been informed that the system has been changed. Thanks for that. I have tried a couple of different destinations/departure airports and it is easier. However it was still much simpler before the changes. I fell the customer has gained nothing.

Easy to use and helpful.Been using it for many years. Now it is a pain to use, just keeps revolving around previous searches with little indication to "clear" previous searches. Useless.latest updates have caused significant search functionality to be very time consuming with navigation just over the top. Not at all happy. Getting a big white screen with "where to? with no further prompt to hit return ,or something else just leaves me in frustration.trying to pre-empt what one is looking for .

Unhelpful and will only add to the cost of your travel. While they can hint at lower cost options, be warned that by booking via Skyscanner you are actually agreeing to them owning your booking. Should anything go wrong or change on your end, it is infact Skyscanner that will need to make the requests for change. This will lead to multiple phone calls, changing line managers that are unable to help, no two way communication on updates, and most importantly no ownership on a resolution. Be warned

The re-design of the app is a total failure, not sure if anyone made any research into thia but everything in the app basically takes twice or 3 timea as many steps and you get useless loads in between. If you want to find a direct one-way flight, the best way to do it is to use any other app basically. Very dissatisfied as the app used to be so simple to use and straight to the point.

I have enjoyed the app for a long time until the recent interface update. It is very counter intuitive and hard to navigate. It took me a long time to find a 'multicity' option, and when I did, I can find no way to save flights and trips. I now use the Kayak app, which is clear and has more functionality.

Edit: Just find out I can choose a country (in my case Italy) and the app provides me all possible solutions for the airports in that country. PREVIOUS REV: Great app, but add the possibility to search from (and to) more than one airport in different cities. For example, I can choose between two or more airports in different cities nearby. At the moment I have to search manually. You already do with multiple airports in a city like new York. So, please do it also with airports in different city.

When going to the website of the best provider to buy the flight ticket, it is better to take it to the genuine and trusted side. Happy Fire, Qiwi, Chief Ticket.in, Budget Ticket, Flight Mojo, Akbar Travel, Goto Gate, Flight Network, it is better not to take it to the fake side. These side payments will be done but they don't send tickets. but easy my trip,goibibo,cleartrip,yatra,is genuine and trusted side

This app is so bad since the new look. Used to just be able to see all the flights you had an eye on and price change alerts at a glance if you clicked to receive the notification. Now you've got to search through a list of trips at the bottom that are impossible to remove to find the destination you've been looking at. Doesn't scroll to the bottom of the list of dates for each destination properly. Really poor. Don't how this create a trip thing works either. Is that going to save me?

It used to be a great app and service overall. I have no idea what happened, but now it's just so confusing and unhelpful. The feature to see prices on the calendar is great - except it never works and when I search, there is no flight for such price. And sometimes, it doesn't even find the flight at all. It is so confusing. I was searching for a flight on skyscanner for like 15 minutes, then I opened kiwi and within 2 minutes, I found a suitable flight. What happened, skyscanner?

What has happened?! Pre-COVID I used to live on this app. Was 5 stars. So easy to find the best option. As the world very slowly starts to open up again I come back to my old friend Skyscanner and everything has changed! Gone is the ability to search +/- 3 days. Feel like time has been turned back 5 years. Why change something that worked so well? :(
I love to travel and browsing with Sky Scanner has found me incredible bargains including international flights ..

Omg. This is the weirdest UX solution. Yes, they have Month view which has been missed by everyone. But it's not right where you expect it to be, smth like a tumbler in the Dates section when you choose a flight. No, you must scroll down the main page, there will be Month view. By default it has return flight. If you don't need it, you might want to find how to switch to the one-way mode, and it's not that easy. I'll continue to use skyscanner with a web browser on my phone, thank you.
They broke "explore everywhere" feature. It searches only next month.
It's good app, but whenever i search hotels and sort by prices low to how the app stops working and exits by itself

I am really disappointed with the latest iteration of the app. It used to be superb, but is now trying to be too smart and has lost a lot of the functionality. I usually am trying to find flights for me and my family, but can't see where to change the number of passengers until after flights are chosen. Also, it only tells the cheapest flight in any given month, rather than indicating cheaper and more expensive days to help inform choices. Please get this sorted as it's currently no good.

Can you please recommend another flight app company to use , cause with this update you have destroyed Sky Scanner. You managed to make this the most difficult to use app. It is so frustrating to use , i want to pull out my hair. No more calender view , more steps to select cities , difficult to chose only direct flights. It is just a mess. How do you come up with this , seems your development team lost touch with user and have no idea what they doing. You ruined somthing that was working well.

You can't search for flights with a +/- a few days range which would be simple to add. The travel time toggle is utterly reduntant and unhelpful. A wider search of 'nearby' airports would help a lot too. Also the app keeps losing my 'hearted'/saved flights meaning I had to do the search all over again numerous times. When it does save and I go to view a saved flight it says 'not enough tickets' even though it clearly shows as still available on my desktop computer.

Pathetic usibility of the app. I being a developer myself found app to be extremely difficult to navigate, search flight change dates etc. It used to be one of the best apps on terms of usibility but now its just shambolic. I can't easily search a flight but destination etc. You don't need to make a fancy interface to make the best usable app. Please take bits out of old interface.
i like skyscanner for uou can find here all schedule that suits your need.not to mention that tocket here is more cheaper than other apps

I mainly use this app to find the cheapest weekend to visit a city on my travel list. It works really well on the iPhone where you can select your destination, filter for weekends, and then browse for the best flight up to almkst a year in advance. On an android you can only browse up to 3 months in advance - at which point prices are higher. If you use it the way I do, you're better off using Google flights or a different app.
very good search engine that does an incredibly great job at going trough most other airline app like Priceline etc to find you best deals

This app used to be great, why changing something very easy to use and to understand with great features for something awful and so hard to have access to find a simple flight. Very disappointed with the interface and what it is now. Took me 10min to figure out how to pick a return flight. Have to go to another company till this one is sorted and user friendly

Easy to select destination and if you're not sure which dates, select the whole month and you can see prices on dates and work out the cheapest departure & return. A good selection of flights come up for the dates so you can choose what suits. I've done it before, got great flight times to make the most of my holiday at great flight prices! You can also "star" them, so you can go back at a later date and book if required. 5* from me!
Great app only issue I have is not allowing me to log in having the same issue for two weeks now.

Unfortunately have to echo all the recent negative reviews. This new update is a disaster. I simply want to search for a flight to a defined city during a defined date. When I enter the city it tells me about just the next month which I am not interested in and it is so difficult to find the screen where I can enter dates. Skyscanners best feature of comparing prices across time also seems to be gone. Who oked this update?

Terrible app (doesn't compare to the website) I really hate the Sky scanner app. I have tried to use it so many times (often using the website and having a good experience) and every time I leave frustrated. It doesn't let you select the whole month to find the cheapest flight, which to me is the only thing that makes skyscanner better than other flight compare sites/apps. I also find it shows me less options, and often more expensive than the skyscanner website, which is just weird.

Skyscanner used to be great. Now it's very slow. Also if I search for fights with 2 adults and 2 children to somewhere that is not a listed destination, it then goes to a new screen where I have to select flights, again, and it forgets that is for 2 adults and 2 children and finds flights for a single traveler. Even if you click on a selection you can't add note passengers and redo the search.
An excellent app, I have ever found!! I should refer this app to everyone I like. Thanks Skyscanner.

The new visual update is very basic looking, logo is a smart idea but looks basic. No share button to allow you to share hotels to friends or family to view before booking. Having to take a screenshots that do not attach a link is not ideal. Also not having the option to favourite hotels to look back through at an easy glance is also not ideal.

The original site and app were essentially the 'Google' of searching for a flight. The new updated interface essentially turns this app into something akin to Yahoo or Bing. The interface is honestly terrible. It may look clean but loses much of the functionality with made skyscanner so useful e.g. booking a flight package to multiple cities (so not just a simple return trip the the same city you landed in). Very little thought has gone into this update.

What was once a simple app is becoming cluttered and unituive. People that use this model want simplicity and value speed but now theres too much going on. When searching, what has happened to searching for a whole month and when using explore to search for a whole month, you don't get a calendar to choose from but a list of already selected flights. The whole reason I use skyscanner is to see that calendar view to choose specific dates and compare.

I loved it, now I hate it since the last update. It's unclear, unusable, difficult to navigate. The old app was awesome, the new is a disaster. It lacks all benefits of the old app. WHAT HAVE YOU DONE???? Multi city search and month price view are gone, and so are many other features a frequent flyer needs. Go back to the old app asap, your app developers got it sooo wrong for the sake of just developing !!!! I Edit 03-09. All features all back. Thank you!!!!!

Why make an app that is worse than the website? I don't see prices in the calender overview, there is no option for cheapest month and whole month, I cannot find my price alerts and the worst: when I change to another app and back, the app reloads, my search is gone and not even in the history.. very annoying. I like the interface and it's nice that you can share the flight easily, for that I give a second star.

Used to be brilliant. The app let the user find the most suitable way to get to a destination. It doesn't do that anymore, so now it's pretty much useless. You can only filter down for direct flights after searching for specific days - then none are direct. No obvious way to search months without putting the dates in. No way to visually see the typical prices for that route at that time (the old bar chart view). Return flights vanish when you select an outbound date. Disappointing.

Used to really like this app, however it seems to get worse with every update, latest one being you can no longer save flights, only create price alerts. Edit: star seems to have changed to a heart, option to save comes up on some flights, but not all, especially when trying to select flight times for an airline that does multiple flights per day to a destination.

Makes things harder than they need to be. Will tell you a price for a date, but that price will fail to be there when you click on it. On first screen the flight might be ¬£330 one stop, the second ¬£290 one stop, before finally ¬£500 2 stops. Lets you select a date but most screen space is showing other useless dates. Very frustrating. You're looking at a flight in April? If you left next week it would be ¬£250 cheaper! Brilliant, why didn't I think of having my Easter holiday next week, cheers

Used to a very good app but now slow and inconsistent. Tracks your searches and raises the price when searching the same flight a few days later. The worst feature is that in the last 3 years, I have NEVER got the flight for the initially advertised price. It's ALWAYS more expensive, and in many cases significantly more expensive

The website and app are not great I'm afraid. All I want to find out is the cheapest day to fly Zante. After pulling my hair out I finally found a month view to get some daft traffic light system which doesn't even show the price until you search. You also need to search one airport at a time! Surely it didnt used to be this bad, otherwise would have never booked through you. Uninstalled and now looking for other price comparison websites. üôÑ

It used to be great, but now the searching options are not functional at all...I can't select destination "everywhere" with direct flights Only. You need to set up the dates and choose the destination first, and only Then you can filter by direct flights only...Complete waste of time tbh! Plus the fact it always remembers my first destnation and date search, which is annoying.

Always changes prices, tracks your searches and makes it more expensive every search. Can use other websites to search and confirm prices. One search a return flight was estimated from 150 dollars once clicked it when up to a minimum of 10k dollars. New app design makes it more difficult to navigate. Will use something like kayak from now on. Don't waste your time searching and researching with this app.

If there is a "O" option to select along with the stars.. I would have given that. Why..what happened to the UI. One of the worst ever UI seen in travel industries. If there is chance to revert to old UI.. I suggest you to do that ASAP before the users uninstall this. Luckly there is no travelling thus this App is still installed on many phones..!

Thanks for providing this awesome service. 2 massive improvements that I think could be made to improve the experience are: 1 - When using the explore feature and selecting the whole month, to be able to select one month for departure and another month for return and not only be limited to one month for both; 2 - Create a map for the explore feature (similar to Ryanair's discovery feature).

I would use the website even from my phone. I don't like the way the flight options are displayed in this app anymore. Visually, it is more difficult for me to catch all of the information I need to make a decision. The website is better, it has the skyscanner style on the way the list of flights are presented, the app now is looking a lot like last minute flights app which I don't use exactly because of the way the list of flights is presented, ugly and plain.

So i have a new phone... When you first install the app, you don't get that screen on first use. You are offered the opportunity to set up an account (which i skipped) then you get a "where do you want to go" screen with no option to tap search, then flights. Only by closing the app and reopening does dialog as you describe it get presented. Maybe you need to rethink the after install use cases?

The app seems to have updated, it takes a lot more steps to get to the list of flights now. I start with 2 passengers and by the time I get to the list of flights its only saying the price for 1 passenger. I have to manually change back to two when I select a flight. The new update made things more complicated than they used to be and a little bit frustrating.

The app works just fine, but 1 star deducted for each of below: 1) searching by country, the prices shown at the 'city' level vs actual prices are vastly different 2) no option to search by ranges (many other app does support it) which makes it very tiresome to search the best options 3) for some cities with more than 1 airport (e.g. Warsaw) you cannot search by city, but only a specific airport even though they are both within 40min drive from the city centre... Takes 2x more time to search

I used to love this app for many years. Now when I search for the flights it shows wrong prices & when I open the flights theyre always more expensive and more often than not with a transfer. Why is it possible to apply 'only direct flights, filter only after I click on specific dates. For me, ditect flights comes before everything else. For me personally it has become genuinely unusable, combined with prices being always way off, its time to delete this app.

Could be better if the 'Explore everywhere' option allowed you to show/filter for direct flights so i can see what places i can get to in shortest possible journey times from my local airport. Currently only when you select one of the presented destinations do you discover that it can only be reached via multiple stops so would be good to filter those out.
Adding a section of travel planner with locations and their destinations will be phenomenal.
Exceptional App But day wise the rate of flight is not appearing in the calendar for some of the months
Date search has become really bad. ONLY overpriced flights. Now under CHINESE ownership - reason to uninstall this SPYWARE!!!

I don't use this app frequently, maybe two-three times per year, so I was shocked how it was changed. For me it is confusing and sometimes annoying and not functional anymore. Please bring back the old visualization where the timeline was horizontal and ticket prices were vertical, so I could really optimize price and date at the same time. Now I have to select where to go and when, and application will send me a price alert if cheaper price will be available. It doesn't help a lot.
U guys must learn from make my trip, where will I get my ticket pdf if I wanted it again. In plan ur trip , u can easily add tickets booked, and so on......

This has been my go to app for many many years. However this latest update is just incredibly and unnecessarily difficult to navigate. I'm going to try the website and hope for better but it's a shame as I've uninstalled the app. What annoyed me most was the fact you're forced to click buttons and cannot use app in sections like it used to. Change for the worse and I hope it gets an update soon as I have a lot of faith in the Skyscanner brand that wont be shaken by one awful update.

I hate to have to leave a bad review. Used to be a 5 star app. I used to use this app monthly and it was great. Now it seems as though it can never find flights. Direct flights apparently dont exist. Yet if you search the exact same criteria direct with the airline, they come up straight away. Not sure what's happened to the app since the pandemic hit, but covid can't be an excuse. It just doesn't find the info it used to.
the best best app for travel. only flight to dubai are missing ex mumbai some bug
The best place to book tickets! Easy to use and trustful üíúüíúüíú
excellent site for flight options, highly recommend for frequent flyers
Fraud from skyscanner and cleartrip. Payment done but no tickets received They are scamstars

Booked a flight, paid, few hours later received a email with notice of my cancellation witch I did not do. Do not use this app or any company associated with it I'm out couple of thousand for nothing and all they tell me is, my money will be refunded back to me in the next couple of days but I need to fly before that. Very very bad service from their side!!!!!!!!! Outrageous!!!!!!

This new look is sooo confusing! Plus, who came up with the idea with the automatic search, the worst new implementation i have ever seen! No, let your customer think and decide, click around, not search automatically for flights, makes your customers not want to use your app:( Your Product Manager is not connected very well with your customers. I never post negative reviews, but your app beated all other screws up buy a long mile, so disappointing

The app is OK but please add the option for fly out and back from the same airport on the android app. Being in London it's a pain having to do the searches by each individual London airport to get only the results out and back from same airport, which drives me to just search on the airlines websites instead. That function is already there on the website so no idea why it isn't on the app.

Really enjoyed using this app. But now its awful . Its trying to be to much, app was perfect to navigate and was just about flights, now its got hotels, car hire. Removing the graph for looking at flights is poor. Now i have to search each date individually. I have read reviews about its because of covid-19, don't believe it as covid-19 has been happening since January and only recently removed the graph. Will this review and all the 1 star reviews change this app for the better. We will see.

I used Skyscanner's own agency to book as the airline agent wouldn't. The pros are the app experience and prompt customer support replies. The bad points apply to pretty much all online travel agents. The upfront fare in my case was slightly less but there's an extra $85 change and cancellation fee per request on top of everything the airline might charge. Even my hefty credit card fee wasn't refunded. Do not use this service during an uncertain period like this pandemic that's for sure.

I was using this app for flight booking as if there were no other apps. I never used any other app for the flight search or booking. Now, I know there exists apps like farefirst which helps book a flight work in a much better way, I switched from skyscanner to farefirst. Also Skyscanner is filled with ads whereas here as the other app is ad free, provides only relevant information via notification. Both the apps are used to search, compare, book flights. Farefirst does this is a most ideal way I guess. They list purely based on price. There are no tricks involved.

Skyscanner can be a very useful tool for one who is doing some well needed research for their next airfare. Not all airlines are represented so one must be sure to look at the missing options. Both listed and unlisted options must be checked against the actual carriers own website to be sure. Great platform to get a guide on pricing.

Decent app but some companies Skyscanner chooses to recommend to you are just criminals. For example, Etraveli Group (mytrip) kept 30% of a refund they were given by LOT Polish airlines when my flight was cancelled and claimed it was their "administration fee". EU law requires a refund of "the full cost of the ticket at the price at which it was bought" but Etraveli don't care about that and Skyscanner are happy to keep recommending Etraveli. Now I just book direct with airlines.

I needed a flight from Asheville NC to Springfield I'll. I changed my departure and arrival times 6 times. All for January 2024. Confirm....NO flights! Not good. Terrible would be a better way to describe it. Even the website which I've always preferred for simple flight searches has turned into a nightmare to use. Hence trying this awful app again. Best to just stick with the actual tour operators individually from now on. A lot less confusing

Not bad per se, but unlike the website I can't seem to find the option to fly out & back using the same airport. I'm not sure why this isn't the default option anyway, with the option instead being to select using different airports for out & back - would've thought that was more useful to most people? Without that it made the app quite useless for me, so I've uninstalled.

I would've given 5 stars previously, but with the new update I cannot see the bar graph with price for different days which was really useful for me to pick the best price. Please bring that back! One of the best Apps with remarkable recommendations of affordable and classy itinerary

Great app overall, but I was almost about to book a flight and didn't realise I had a one hour stopover and had to change to another terminal at the airport in the said time. This app is awful. Filters reset everytime you go back a screen. Selected direct flights only? Tough it resets to all. Trying to use explore to get all the flights listed for a month, it will only show the cheapest match, then the next week, the next month etc . I want the whole month of flights I selected, why is it showing me this useless info? Really desperately needs a feature review

Kind of pointless. I like Skyscanner, especially because I can search 'nearby' airports. This feature isn't available in the App, as far as I can see. However, the mobile optimised (responsive) website is nicely presented and has all the features. It really makes the App redundant in my experience.

It is a great App but I am missing a great feature: I cannot block some destination to avoid the app looking for trips with stops in countries where I need a visa. For example, now with the quarantine restrictions, several countries does not allow flying stops. So I think it would be great to have this option available.

What have you done to the app? The flight search functionality is awful and very unintuitive. It used to be so simple. Changing from single/return flights, removing Direct only etc seems impossible. I have always used this app but it's taken a turn for the worse and will look at alternatives.

Utterly unusable. You cannot enter your starting location if it is different from your actual location. The old app was so easy. With this one it took me 10 minutes to try to book a flight from London to Cambodia when I am already in Cambodia. I was looking at prices for a friend in the UK. I gave up before finding a price. Never going to use skyscanner again. Utter rubbish app. Uninstalled.

Decent app but doesn't have the full searching capabilities of the mobile website. found a great price with Cebu Pacific but can't load the payment page regardless of how many attempts I made
Can't think of another app, except maybe one, that's as efficient, easy and effective as Skyscanner. Looking fwd to seeing more new functions.

Lies upon lies. The price is never like the show it, it changes within minutes, the day by day approximations are different, or the price becomes more when actually buying, and the currency exchange is always off. I can't trust it at all.

cons: price change during search, lack of option to display flights on requested day from airport ( timetable) very different experience between pc and android. pros: It is doing its job

After recent update all the websites are showing same price to book..earlier skyscanner was the best. Looking for alternatives now when the prices are same everywhere why to book from here

When I choose the Vienna airport mentioned however as departure point, it doesn't show any flights I have seen when I had chosen Berlin. Something is terribly wrong with the app.

I do like Skyscanner and find it helpful most of the time, however, there is a frustrating bug I have reported previously but is still occuring. Its an awful site, once you start looking for your flight the next half an hour the price will increase drastically. Another greedy awful site that loves to scam everyone it can.

Gives you an acceptable price, and then when you go to check out and enter all info, you get prompted with a "the price has increased" message. App doesn't work. Crashes at the point of inputting departure location and doesn't recognize internet connection or location.
App doesn't send you the details And later you should speak with airlines and find out. It should be so simple to get instructors.

Not to be trusted. Following a very bad experience from making a booking on Skyscanner I have deleted the app. I don't trust Skyscanner or the cowboy travel agents vying for business. They have my hard earned money for a long saved for family holiday...and are so leisurely in their responses... Even obtrusive. Never again. I will happily pay more next time to get better customer service.
It's a nice and useful app, but it's totally not cool that they started to spam me like crazy with emails after the signup.

Only users that have used sky scanner for a few years know what a let down this app now is. I install & uninstall almost immediately at regular intervals hoping in vain they may change it back to the simple to use fantastic flight search engine it used to be. I search for flights almost everyday & it really pains me that I have to use the less appealing desktop version ..

This used to be such a good app. Ive been using Skyscanner since 2003, well before apps were a thing. Now that travel is back open I started using it again. Where is the amazing explore section with a choice of weekend breaks and fantastic destination deals?!! Why is it so clumsy and obtuse to use. So sad. Its basically just another disappointing app. AND it's so ugly to use view now!

Not as good as the website. UI certainly looks nice but that's useless if the UX suffers. It's too minimalist, can't find what I need to. That is, the whole month search (which specifically shows you which days are cheapest to fly) which sky scanner is actually useful for.
Excellent app for finding, very cheap and good flights. Skyscanner is name to be trusted beyond any doubt.

Its fiddly, and its not simple to just select direct flights only. I want a view of all the direct flights over the course of an entire month but for some reason I don't have those options when searching using the app. I dont want to have to guess some dates either and then apply filters because it's a waste of time. Its just better to go to the website.

Trying to rent a car I read all the details and all the provided documents. It resulted this intermediary withdraws (or MAY withdraw but it's not clear to me what prevents them from doing it) a $1500 security deposit no matter what the terms and conditions of your final renting company will say. This sum will not include the rental cost or any insurance fees you will pay to the actual rental company. Are you sure you still wanna rent a car through this app? Be careful, the terms and conditions are available via a link on the very last "page", after you provide your personal details and almost confirm you agree with everything... :)

The Skyscanner website was my bible, I was a frequent user and undoubtedly the main reason was the search feature. The ability to be able to search for flights anywhere from a certain airport and select any month and show the cheapest month was brilliant. The fact you are preventing me from using the mobile website and trying to force me onto an app, which doesn't allow to search by months hurts my soul. Please fix the app and make it better but also allow us to use the mobile website again.

This update is a complete disaster. Gone is type of aircraft used on selected route. Only top flight option opens. As often as not, price choice will not open. If you want to keep me and probably thousands of others, if you do need to update your app, at least keep the key elements of flight selection.

Terrible app on a mobile phone, text overlapping and filtering is hard to navigate, especially when trying to look at monthly flights. Overall very poor in comparison to the actual website. The whole app GUI needs completely overhauled. Uninstalled & now using the website. Also, judging by other reviews, Skyscanner aren't listening to customers.

With the latest updates this app is not like before. I used it for years but in the last time, many flights are missing, it became difficult to look for flexible days for flights. Now it works more on "recommendations. Use website without app, it works better. But I have better alternative apps so I'm out.

They have a tie up with such websites like happy fares, who provides wrong information to customers and charge a wrong cancellation fee to customers and skyscannner takes no action, so i strongly suggest kindly avoid skyscanner and happy fares for any of your bookings.

The app is good to find lowest price to desired destination. But search API gets exhausted very quickly. If we search 2-3 nearby airports, search result is just "Oops, something went wrong". Seems app is not properly tested for performance, out-of-box scenarios. Otherwise, this app could have potential to take place everyone's devices.

The app is all about deceivingly cheap offers that don't exist. Only $139 to Cambodia! But when you dive in the cheapest return flight is $1000 more! It never happened that the real price equalled to the highlighted offer on the front page. It's all about tempting and bluffing with Circe-like songs. Once Skyscanner was THE place for finding cheapest flights but this is no more so. Today the best offers are once again on airline own sites.

Contacted support team as was suggested here. Unfortunately it didn't solve anything, the support team stopped answering after the first answer. Original review: It used to be a great app but starting from some day it's been just constantly showing me "No flights found for this route" despite the fact that there're plenty of options on the airlines websites and on the apps of the competitors (e.g. Aviasales).

Great comparison use for flights and gaging estimate cost with minimal luggage. But i rarely book on the app. There needs to be a luggage filter (baggage allowance - e.g airlines providing 2 bags at 23kg on long haul!) I just use the site initially to discover the two airlines to book on their sites independently. It is annoying, especially because i use it for long haul so there's always 2 airlines - a stopover for connecting. A faff. Please make a baggage allowance filter on next app update!

The app used to work fine till 1st week of April 2023, but since two weeks the destination and origin (where to and where from) is unable to select, doesn't matter how many times I re-install the app, it didn't work for the mobile app. Even in support section this is the only solution mentioned to fix any problem related to mobile skyscanner app. Hence uninstalling it

Great app at what it does but with some serious bugs too. I tried logging in.
