Also, I can't create alert notification for flight prices. It shows a toast saying unable to create the price alert. After this, I'm automatically logged out. Tried it multiple times with no luck.

I've used skyscanner for years but won't be using it again since their latest update has taken away the only aspects which made it worthwhile. Explore function and search by cheapest month were the only things putting skyscanner ahead of its competitors, I have no idea what would possess them to get rid of these features. Terrible decision.

Skyscanner used to be my one stop solution for all flight booking needs (and I'm a frequent traveler). But has become appallingly bad in the last few months. Different fares on Skyscanner and booking site, flights no longer available after having me fill in all personal and payment info. I'll be uninstalling the app and moving to another platform.

Shyscanner or Skyscammer? My flight bookings were cancelled and I didn't get the money back in full. I paid with a European Visa card. On top of that I had to set up an account with XCover to get the money back for the insurance I booked. Altogether it took me a month and many hours of emailing....

Not happy, I love Skyscanner website it's always my go to website for cheap flight tickets and thus finally I downloaded the app for mobile but it was disappointing as I couldn't search for multi journey flights in the app which you can do on website. Love the live map of the travel restrictions and criterias!!! Makes it so convenient to see what's happening. Didnt know in some countries, quarantine is not necessary anymore! Anyway been using this app for yearssss pre-COVID19 and its amazing. Always getting really good flight deals with such an eady interface. Can't wait for some normalcy to return.

This app used to be excellent but has taken backward leaps with each update it seems. Used to be fantastic, now useless! I have been using this app to book my flights for years, never seems to find the cheap flights anymore... just proved it, found a ¬£44 flight, was brousing Sky Scanner for a better flight/deal, same day/same flight and it was showing at ¬£143...I realise that once I started to book, the proper price would have been charged, but how can you find a bargain if the app is ¬£99 wrong on the price!

Why can you not make this more like the web version. Let me select direct flights from the start. Let me see prices on individual dates. Let me select a range of dates. Let me select more than one airport to compare. Make the selection of dates less buggy, it keeps defaulting or just not work. This app would be better if it was just a link to the website. Wake up and smell the Chromebook. Its not new technology anymore. Why can I not browse flights from my Chromebook? its fine until the point you have to put in your destinations... then nothing? not getting deal price shown and when click its higher

Always used Skyscanner for years and 90% of my travel. However taking a couple of stars off. The more added vendors, the more I'm facing a situation where prices quoted are later not available once you go to the 2nd stage of booking. Annoying and never used to happen before in this volume. Hopefully more control over practices that are evidently click baits from some companies. Otherwise a stable app and generally good rates in normal use.

Like the app but find it difficult that I have to search THEN filter. Would be so much better and less time consuming to filter first. So if I want to find flights to anywhere but only direct ones lasting under 4 hours, I'd like to be able to search using those advanced terms. At the moment I search but flights that last over 30 hours with 3 stops come up. Most of the flights advertised as in budget take 2 days to get to destination. Please could you introduce more search parameters?

Love this app, but sometimes u get broken links, prices that don't exist, or the monthly planner shows one price than the total price is much More than the sum of it. The worse part is the explore everywhere button which is a brilliant idea, not always work. U press, and nothing. That's why they get 3 stars. They also do what flights websites do, once u searched several times, u won't get lower than that, just higher. But if u search on someone else's phone or online from another device, u will.

I love Sky Scanner, it usually serves me well but lately, it is useless. Why tell me there is a direct flight from ¬£28 then when I click through there are no direct flights and the cheapest if over ¬£200? How is that helpful? Practically renders the app useless, I am going to have to find my flights somewhere else now till you fix this issue. Then I may come back. Also like someone else mentioned, bring back the 'cheapest', 'quickest', '2nd cheapest', etc, you used to have. Much better with that.

Bravo! Just learn from Skyscanner on how to turn one of the best flight ticket aggregators into a heaping pile of manure. The new update on the app has done away with the multi-city flight search option, which was THE best and most convenient feature. The lack of the multi-city search option renders this app useless. I really fail to understand the reason for this 'downgrade' just for the sake of rolling out new versions. The development team should just be fired for this phenomenal blunder.

The new layout is really poor. Got to go through multiple screens for the simplest search. Where is the 'everywhere' option? Where is the multi-city search? Very unintuitive and can't really see anything that's improved. If it ain't broken....

It used to be awesome but now it sucks balls. Cluttered with a bunch of useless information I don't care about. I used skyscanner to check on cheap flights, nothing more. Now not only is it troublesome to do so quickly, even finding the app has become a chore because some moron decided they had to change the logo to something diametrically different. Final drop, I'm going to use another flight finder.

Awful. The new app has completely trashed skyscanner. No longer the expert's choice of travel app its loss of functionality has downgraded it to just another cheap fares app. Many others do that better. Can't imagine what they were thinking of. Goodbye skyscanner genuinely sorry to see you smashed up like this.

Unfortunately I've decided to uninstall and switch to another app. Been using this app since about 2014 and it's been completely ruined with the new update. Other apps have brought in the calendar search (specific days not these unspecified dots that actually make the whole function redundant. Change it back before you lose more customers. Someone who doesn't understand marketing has been hired to the wrong position. Upload the old version while you work on whatever it is next.
i did not want to give a bad review , but what have you done with the last updated is beyond understanding, please go back to the earlier layout. Why fix something which isn't broke.
Why don't they make finding settings easy? Why hide the settings?

Rated 1 star because skyscanner listed BestJet, which had lost AFTA accreditation, with a 5 stars rating beside it. This had indirectly caused thousands of users, including me, who chosed to believe skyscanner, purchased their flight ticket through BestJet and thus lost up to tens of thousands of hard earned dollars. Skyscanner could have done better, that is, to remove every dodgy agents from their recommendations to better protect their users.

Terrible layout!! I need to use sky scanner to find some return flights. From the possible fights found, I would like to be able to pick the best outbound flight and then pick the best return flight. However, unless I've missed something (definitely possible) all i can see are hundreds of outbound and return PAIRS of flights that i now have to sift through. This is next to useless - actually worse than useless as it's a huge waste of my time.

Again a change of interface that makes it harder to simply search for flights... They tried this already a year ago, now the same again. Why make it so difficult to get to the interface everyone needs - flight search? I don't need a covid regulations map and some additional search window where I must first add a generic destination. I am not sure whether you really know your core users / customers...

Since when Sunday is the first day of the week? Edit: regional settings in the app are set correctly (to my country, where week start on Monday). So my best guess is that it's a very irritating bug. Edit #2: you seriously can't fix a locale bug over two months..? The problem is that calendar checks locale from the set language of the app and NOT region you set your app. If you have trouble reproducing the bug, contact me and I will help you.

Used to be excellent. Usability now absolutely dreadful. It's almost impossible to search by month (hit and miss when it gives you the option to select a month) and whenever you want to change airport it takes you back to the home screen. I sincerely find it difficult to navigate, never used to be the case.

I booked my ticket for my December trip through this app in September. The app said that my booking is confirmed and my ticket will be issued shortly so I've waited for a ticket. However, it hasn't issued by a month before the trip so I contacted Skyscanner. Then, they said that they need the statement from the bank for refund. I didn't ask for a refund. I just needed my ticket. I'm so disappointed. I end up paying more than double for my new ticket. They should consider this problem seriously.

The app was working just fine until a week ago and I loved using it and purchasing tickets in it. However, after updating it, flights no longer load. It says "Oops, something went wrong". I can't use the app anymore. It could be my Android phone getting too old? I have no idea what the problem is but all my other apps still work great.
It lists flights in a random currency and trust to get you to sign up to fix that problem. Yes sign up so it can overcharge

I won't be using the app anymore since the removal of the price graph. There is no way to search for the best prices anymore. As someone who used Skyscanner to book nearly every flight in the past, I'm taking my preferences elsewhere to a more upfront, more user friendly, and less greedy app that works for its users and not against.

great app but needs to be more transparent with its pricing as I noticed different price correlations between regions like for example it was more expensive to buy the exact same flight going the same way for the region of Thailand, then if I bought a flight in Europe which I found strange. but overall a good app to use if you want cheap flights.

Shows 3rd party booking agencies who issue boarding passes that are not accepted by the airline, so when you get to the airport you have to pay twice! There was no warning of this at any point of the searching or booking process. Also there are so many times that you find a good price shown then when you select it the prices skyrocket which makes finding an actual affordable flight very hard.

Things appear to have gone down hill since the recent change. Used to be a solid 4/5 stars but no longer easy to use/navigate. The option for a multi-city flights trip used to be very easy and obvious. Not even sure you can do that now?! If it is I can't see it. If not, it ceases to be useful. Shame.

It was always 5 start until the last update. Please bring back the usual 'from', 'to' and 'date' fields. This new set up makes it confusing to choose departure and destination. It's a really bad user experience. Sick to what works. From-Date To-Date.

For some reason pushed me to edreams with no other options. Look at thier feedback! Rubbish. So now concerned of hassle for next 5 months waiting on departure time. On 5th email from edreams already. Why? Not only that cost 50% more than booking by jet2 direct. We are talking hundreds! Not impressed. Was going to delete Skyscanner app but will use but avoid thier suggestions for now. May eventually delete.

The app is useful, although the prices are not 100% accurate as the final price to be paid. And I am curious why Skyscanner would include those providers with only 1 star. And the part that I dislike is that although I am on price alert, I get no email,, until I personally go into the app again and check for latest prices.. the following day, I will get an email of prices that I was forced to check on my own because the price alert was not working.

We were told we would have a flight credit at no extra charge for any flight because we had to stay in a different country in quarantine. But then they kept trying to guess more fees and more on the price difference apparently. I hate this company and I hate this app and I will never use them again no recommend them to anybody else.

Booked a complete ticket (2 checked bag and 1 cabin bag) based on the info displayed in the app. Turned out that it was a plus ticket (1 checked bag and 1 cabin bag). I paid the amount for the complete ticket and now I have to pay additional amount for an extra check-in baggage. Had I booked this same ticket directly from the airlines website, it would have been cheaper contrary to what the app was showing. Horrible experience !!

I miss that part I could see the price bars, comparing between dates, it was the best part of the app. There I could plan which date could be the best option for me to travel, by analysing the price. The new interface brings three colours, but those colours don't tell me anything.

humans are worse the RATS and skyscanner is no exemption. they know I travel a lot and the algorithm is always trying to get high prices. I did exactly the same search lodged in, different browser and the one that goes incognito TOR gives the lowest price for exactly the same fight and dates and time. plus when click to next screen that shows all possible fights and prices, its price is increased above 9% from the calendar plus when go to book the ticked its even more expensive. RATS
I have used this app and to my surprise it is very reliable at guiding one on the best option for flights. Thank you very much.

The app used to be amazing with the bar charts showing pricing. Could plan ahead. Fiddle about with dates/returns etc. Its now really complicated. Dont know why there is no direct filter on every screen. I dont want a result that shows 3 stop overs on a 2 hour flight to spain! Shouldnt even really be an option no matter how cheap it is.
Used to use this app all the time buy with it changing the price every time you click on a date, and the slow searches not going to be using it anymore.

Filter closes every second as flights keep updating Filters all reset on every search...very irritating when you're looking for the same filters to be applied........ [UPDATE]..... reinstalled app. Same issue. 1. Add locations and dates, search. 2. Filter departure times 3. Change dates, search ... All filter settings are removed and have to be entered again
There should be option to add checked bag in the search results. Edit: Thanks for your response. I installed the app again and waiting for the update.

Explore everywhere option is gone permanently from homepage, price shows less in beginning but when you go to book ticket, price suddenly increases dramatically to too high more than 3 times. This App have become like any other apps available in the market. This App seems useless now, for me atleast. Gave 2 star because earlier it was good, not anymore.

Couple of years ago this was the best app and experience you could get regarding flights. Now feels like the UI/UX has downgraded 90%. Reverting to the old if possible, would be the best option, it had all the features needed.

Turned to be the worst app! I always used this app for my flight booking but now whenever I try to book a flight the rates shown in the list drastically differes and shows much higher rates. The fare gets increase by 2k to 4k per ticket. Will stop using and recommendations for Skyscanner. Very disappointed with the service n feels like I'm being cheated. Please stop fooling people

The new app version is so bad I actually took the time to come to play store and give it a 1 star rating. Used to be much better when they started. Now complicating things, too many ads and infos for each search. In the flight results, half of the application is covered by "about our search flight" and it is impossibile to delete it. I use a Oppo phone.

This is warning of Sky Scanner. I booked a flight last month on Premira airlines from New York to Hurghada, Egypt through Sky Scanner. When I went to the airport, I found out that the flight was cancelled because the airlines went bankrupt. The airlines didn't send me any notification before! I stuck in the airport for hours without any help. I didn't have enough money to buy another ticket. Without a help from a friend of mine, I could not have been returned to my destination! I tried to reach out Premira airlines but it was not possible, they shut down all their offices. When I emailed sky scanner, asking them to compensate me of the extra cost I paid, they simply said, this is not our problem, we are just search engine! I told them, that I understand that they are a search engine in normal cases but in such case when the airlines simply disappear without just notifying their customers, they have a responsibility if they want to keep reputation of being safe engine. It's serious matter that sky scanner didn't take notice that one of the airlines, it market for has cancelled all its flights three weeks before. I'm sure hundreds of people have gone through same agony and sky scanner didn't even bother to reach out with any notifications to at least inform them in advance so they could avoid the hassle and the cost of going to the airport!
They reduce the fare of flights because they put you on group bookings. Till last moment I haven't recieve boarding pass. Neither any confirmation from airlines

Congratulations on ruining what was a brilliant and useful app. The UI is so counter intuitive now it's basically unusable. The whole month function disappeared which means I need to use another site to find which days my flight runs. Absolutely awful, idiotic decision. I have already downloaded a different app and will be uninstalling Skyscanner as soon as I've posted this review.

Sky scanner is turning into sky scammer?? I have just found an itinerary, quoted and paid for that itinerary from the app with the only recommended partner Sky-Tours. 20 minutes later SkyTours is contacting me privately through email, changing the complete itinerary without any discussion or options This is on a multistop international trip. What a disaster. None of these transactions are visible in the app. Meanwhile my money is taken. [Updated with correct vendor name] [Full details sent to Skyscanner support showing 22% increase in pricing requested after paying the offered price, why take my money if you can't sell the ticket]

really easy and probably the most convenient search app. could have more cash back organised

I don't know what happened but this app has degraded badly. Still as poor as ever. Price difference from estimated to actual complete polar opposites. Doesn't like you selecting a whole month for travel flexibly wants actual dates. Not as good as the website Edit: constantly shows no flights available, unable to just search flexible dates for full months like on the website. I look at entire 2-3 month periods on the website to see when the cheapest time to travel is, I can't do this on the app

The app was great once upon a time. It had a lot of useful functions, EG.: price widget, price comparison in a chart view. But the development team removed these features. It's useful to use the price tracker to find the best time to buy... if it's accurate. When booking a recent trip I found the actual price of the flights almost double what the price alerts had been telling me. Not ideal for cost saving.

I am begging you guys to bring back the feature called "calendar view", which is a graph that shows the cheapest and most expensive flights depending on the day. This was single handedly the sole reason I used you guys for 100% of my flights and now the feature is gone. Now we just have to blindly guess which days are the cheapest and it takes hours. I promise I will change this to a five-star review if you guys can get this feature back. Please please please please. We are begging! Thanks!

Due to the coronavirus pandemic, my flights home were cancelled. Attempted to call to arrange new flights, no answer. Flight status never updated on app, still says "confirmed". Will NEVER book through skyscanner again.

i loved this app, it was my 'go to app' when I needed to locate flights and used it frequently to source ones suitable for me. I love Skyscanner! They make it easy to get on the app put in your destination and you can just click on the calender and see the prices for each day of the month. I grade down. I found an issue last a year with low cost flights prices. This is not a single event. The issue is all the cheapest flights , which are low-cost companies , are actually fake. This app would actually have made me pay more because I was on Delta site and found a good flight before taking a look at this app. I looked and noticed that first they didn't have lower prices then the ones I found. Last update destroyed it. Previously it was easy - you out itinerary, you out your dates and here you go. Awful recent updates. No idea what has gone on, you can no longer see the calendar of flight options, it's too busy giving you odd data recommendations. Don't usually write reviews, but the current version of the app is unusable

I think is the best flight search engine. The only reason that i give 4 stars is that its very hard to find cheap dates now. I was using the 4.9 version of the app untill 3 days ago but now it has stopped working. That is the version that i recommend as best and easiest ever to find cheap date flights.

I booked my flight and they took sent me an email after couple of hours with explanation that my request failed and I will get money back in 5-10 days. I tried to book another flight through the app and that flight wasn't on official site of the airline company! It was the first time that I used this app and never again. Very bad experience!

Hey Skyscanner - put a feedback button inside your app so I can send you suggestions privately - where has the "direct flights only" button gone when I am picking my date? This is a massive oversight, prices on dates are useless if you can't show those dates with direct flight only prices. Its available on desktop still. - There are some changes which have meant to streamline the app but have made it worse by removing the amout of customization for a search.

I have been using this application for years now but today I was disappointed because your algorithm thinks is smarter than your customers, so I was searching for a specific flight and when I got to your provided calendar it was showing so many green marked dates or cheap flight,when I decided to change my destination and later went back to the same destination all of a sudden your algorithm decides that no more green marks on the calendar for the same search from few minutes ago so that's üò°

During, booking my tickets it is showing booking for only 1 passanger, I am not able to select more than 1 passanger. As I have added 3 passangers but the app is asking that, you can select only 1 person at a time. If family has 3 members than how can we book individual for everyone, it should be in one. #skyscanner Kindly go through it. Awaiting for the answer.

Every Travel app as soonest you install and open it you get today's date or the day you're using.... I looked for a plane ticket for today never change month, day, and much less will I change year. Well I bought a ticket for today and paid. When I get the confirmation was today's date except for the year!!! I call to the airline and no they didn't have nothing to do with it, so I am looking to contact Skyscanner and there's no way to find a customer service phone number.. now??

Awful. You select your dates and select everywhere to see the available options to decide where your going, only to find you have to go into the destination city before you can select direct flight only then there are no flights. If only you could select direct flights from the search instead of sifting through every city and selecting direct only!!

It constantly shows the following: "There is an error loading your flights. Please check your internet connection while we check our servers." I mean I'm rating the app with my internet and that seems to be working fine. So far the application has been disappointing.

They have the HIGHEST prices of all the search sites and have to most invasive sign up to get the deals including I.D. numbers and exp dates ect..so in order to get the deals you will need to give them enough information to completely still your identity or you won't get the "real deals" NO way to contact them. On the surface they only show you the most expensive prices and even make getting alerts a total long process and Hassel. This app is dangerous and frustration!! I'm reporting them.

Got a booking done through skyscanner. It redirected me to other websites. I have completed the booking with Flight Network and it created automated email address for all airlines. Now i cannot manage my bookings and flight network and airlines does not want to help. Skyscanner allowed flight network to hamdle these bookings and it is equally responsible

The recent updates are a disgrace, ruined all of this. I agree with all the other recent reviews that are angry that you've removed the new features. I can only think that Skyscanner is deliberately making it harder to find cheap dates to fly so that customers end up paying more and they somehow get higher commission from the airlines. Why else would they remove their best feature? Skyscanner you are pathetic, bring back the old features or you will lose so many loyal customers.

Dear Member or members of this app develop team, I am a very fan of your this app. I am using this app for a long time on both iOS (iPhone) and Android and PC... PLEASE...... add thoes options again.... we are in need of those options a lot... Thanks a lot for clear me up... :-). (on your reply)

App works well, customizable notifications and you can set multiple "trips" if you want to play with dates. Deleted it because we want to fly Southwest and they don't include them. Other airlines have hidden fee for checking bags.

PLEASE DO NOT BOOK TICKETS VIA THIS APP. Booked tickets via Sky scanner . Money got deducted for airlines called budget air but didn't receive the tickets. I was searching to skyscanner for the best deals for a trip to see friends in usa and wanted to get the revalant and best information and flights because of the covid 19 pandemic .....I hav since now been blocked from accessing the site as I think that the scanner bots think i was misusing the site Its been very frustrating and I was about to purchase a ticket after workn out the best deal for me and I was booted I do not hav access the server now I'm very disappointed

What on earth were you thinking? Where is the multi-city function. I want to fly from London to Quito then from Lima back to Manchester. The app and website look cleaner but have lost their functionality. Back to Expedia unfortunately.

This app is not effective at providing accurate cheapest flight details. If you search flights via different hubs, individual searches on different legs of a journey provides price differences of around 40% less for the same journey from start to final destination compared to the pricing provided for flight searches from the journey start position to the end destination as a single search. Also, when searching Agoda website, flight prices are cheaper than on Skyscanner.

Easy to use, no ads, and you really do find some of the cheapest flights around. Love the "Fly Everywhere" search option. My only complaint is the amount of difficulty it takes to search by whole entire months instead of a specific date.

so far so good for one way and round trips but when you put in Multi City the results are so confusing I can't make it out. I am looking for a long haul Int'l flight with multi cities and I am totally lost. Other than this, its a good app.

I used this app for many years, time to uninstall and find an alternative flight finding app.You have ruined it. Used to be great but now the new app is terrible. You used to be able to find the cheapest day to fly but not any more, now it's the same as every other app. Such a shame. Why didn't you leave it alone. You have lost this customer of many years.

Very handy and quick. In sort and filter, it would be useful to add further options such as sort by cheapest, fastest, most popular, etc. And also to show results based on specific departure / arrival time interval instead of one sided interval.

It's a decent search tool but there's no option to save a search to the "Trips" page. And it will not remember any searches performed directly from the "My Trips" page. Even when I turn on notifications for a search. This app is embarrassingly broken

Amazing app! I'm so pleased with the deals this was able to find for me. I had four similar apps to search for flights and rentals, and none of them even got close to finding the deals that Skyscanner found. Very grateful that I found Skyscanner. I will be using for years to come!

There is a serious problem. When you find a better rate and go to that particular site for booking, rates change or there are service fees that make it a bad choice. Search results should show final prices including all hidden costs and charges. If this issue isn't fixed, it's really useless.

Thank you for reaching out. I'm not sure what the issue was. I even restarted my phone several times. But it seems to he working again. Back up to the well deserved 5 star rating. I found out about your app from some traveling youtube content creators. Very impressive and competitive pricing search. Difficult to find any lower prices.

Very bad new interface, very clumsy, almost useless. It used to be the best flight search app. I already changed for another app. If you change it back to the previous interface, let me know, I might swap back.

Ok it's been a while since I've used this app but it used to be good. Now it looks terrible, it's unclear, what happened to departure and destination? Now there's departure and some weird symbol like I'm going to mark a spot on a map. Doesn't display nearly as many flights, no flights from Jetstar? Do they have to pay to be included? Shows 1 flight from the monthly view, yet if you pick a blank day, what's up with that? There is nothing nice to say about this app. Bring back the old one.

I love this app. It's fast and responsive, filled with deals you wouldn't find elsewhere like Expedia or Travelocity. i found a last minute flight that was almost $200 cheaper than any other website. Definitely one of my go-to apps!

Update: They have now updated the app and it now shows prices in order like before. If you're looking for an app that provides spontaneous travel this app is for you. Earlier this year I went to America for 3 months after finding super cheap flights to Boston. Can't recommend enough.

The app itself is good, clean, easy to use and offers the same as the web browser version...the reason that I've marked it down is my phone kept detecting it using the camera in the background, despite me switching off the permission to do so.

Seriously a once great travel booking app that has been degraded to a confusing non linear mess with limited results, this app does not work like it used to and regrettably I have to find a better 'workable' solution. Needless to say uninstalled and won't be back to this once exceptional now trash application.

The new layout is terrible for what I use the app for...to find good flight deals. Instead it has moved away from its original purpose and instead dumps me in a page full of reviews and ads. The app itself keeps restarting while navigating around this mess. Disappointed.

So many ads on tv for this app but 2 months of using this app... it hasn't given me a single price change update for the tracked destinations. Everyday it gives me alert that price hasn't changed. On other end, I confirmed that prices has changed on the tickets for the destinations I was tracking.

A scam like the others. It only tells you up or down prices from the last price, not from the original watch price. You can easily think you are getting a deal when in actuality the price may be several hundred dollars higher than your original watch price. The whole reason to watch a price is in hopes it goes down from what you first saw.....that is when I set the watch, duh!

It's quite an intruding little app for a ‚ÄòNotepad' It gives itself permition to access you accounts and contacts. Don't think of it as a simple text editor. It's not !! I definitely wouldn't use it to store any sensitive information on my phone.

Prior to the recent update, I was able to view the equipment, i.e. the plane type in use for the selected journey. This isn't available anymore. So one more option os choosing a comfortable cabin has been taken away. Probably it isn't worth using this app anymore. Direct booking with airlines would be better.üëé

Used to love this app. This last update is absolutely awful. They took away the ability to search as destination "anywhere" and dumbed down the interface way more than necessary considering it was already simple enough before. Please revert back to the old interface!

New updated app is awful. Really poor and limitted build. Awkward to use and navigate between destinations. No switch departure/destination fuction. Just a pain to use. Not user friendly. Wont use anymore, better, quicker, more user friendly options available.

Not really the fault of Skyscanner but some of the airlines advertise the lowest fare which only allows for a handbag. Once you add in a carry on bag or luggage in the hold that cheap ticket jumps up. Trying to compare prices then is really difficult. The actual fares can only be determined by going to each individual provider.

It really does look at airliners, that dont show up, on bigger search engines. plus I have seen them, to be cheaper that expedia. One thing I wish they would do. Is to not show sold out tickets on searches. It just confuses people. Other than that good app.

WORSE. EVERY. skyscanner cannot help me to get in touch with the travel agency which is "TRAVELGENIO". Changes were made to my flight through the airlines and i cannot do anything for refund or rescheduling unless Travelgenio does that from their end. And travelgenio does not pickup the calls or reply to the email and my flight is in 3 days. I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO DO IN THIS SITUATION. Skyscanner should work with agencies who are legimate but IT'S ALL FAKE & SCAM! VERY DISAPPOINTED. 0%

First time I had booked my flights for 3 adults, but unfortunately there was a issue with the covid-19 the whole world. So was trying to get in touch with travel up on which I had booked my flights for more than a week. Not a single customer care representative is replying emails nor answering calls. This is the worst customer service I ever experienced in my life. Don't no whom to deal with my query.

Had to book multiple flights within a span of 10 days. If I would stick with one particular OTA I would have spent way more than what I did using Skyscanner. Loved the fact that I could use different service providers for different dates. Very useful app.

This app use to be amazing and straight forward but after a UI update/change it is impossible to actually search for a flight from one location to a destination. Not sure why you changed the user interface when it was perfectly functional.. quite disappointed

Latest update has made it really annoying to use, it was previously so simple to quickly look for specific dates and adjust. Now the explore feature just gets in the way, isn't helpful and means I have to start again to do minor adjustments to my search. So annoying!

Privacy problems. No matter what I do, turn off all location settings and this app can override and figure out the country I'm in. While this is a privacy concern, the third party search results remain in the wrong currency and language despite setting them in the Skyscanner app's preferences. Uninstalled.

This is the best travel app. Period! They are honest, reliable and and with a usee friendly interface. Thank you, Guys. You guys are doing a great job. I think other travel app should learn from 'Skyscanner' how to make it easy and useful to the consumers.

Found less expensive flights on Expedia. Also, when I tried to book a flight on my phone, it kept saying that I had to "choose how to proceed" which didn't give me any indication on how to proceed. All of the programs that came up as options didn't actually allow me to book a flight. Seems like their app wasn't compatible with my phone.

I cannot set the parameters for my plan, I can only set the number of travellers for a flight (which completely changed prices for me) and for accomodation separately. So I cannot "get inspired" for two adults at all. Probably I won't use this service for accomodation that way.

It's doing the job! Found where I'm going with ease and set notifications. My only gripe is i had to set notifications for each different day as my departure date is flexible and I'm just looking for the cheapest flight.

Absolutely fantastic app and the only place you can search up hotels and flights and it gives you great options, it has the best prices for you even while you're in the app its consistently trying to give you the most up-to-date pricing! Totally recommend this app. You won't be disappointed.üòÅ

its OK, but not as functional as an app as the web site is. Can't do an 'open' search or search by month etc. The app would be better if it had the full functionality. UPDATE. after speedy info from customer support have tried as suggested and it works. It was just my inability to use the app properly. Have upgraded from 3 to 5 stars.

Getting really good results from this app. Nicely designed and results load very fast. Shows best, cheapest, and fastest flights - 3 categories - at the top of results so you won't waste time scrolling a lot to find the right flight. I booked my Greece trip flight through Skyscanner and it worked out quite well. Much better than scanning a lot of individual booking websites.

It is a pretty good app. You would get great deals on it most of the time. I have booked flights to Munich twice on Skyscanner and was able to get the best deals. In fact the people who I booked it for was quite surprised by the deal I was able to find, when it was a lot expensive when they checked else where.

HATE the newest version. Too many clicks to just choose your origin, destination and date. All used to be on one screen and now it takes you through multiple steps. They've sacrificed usability for aesthetics. Shame.

The app is ok but the user experience Kris getting worse not better. It's really frustrating that you can select direct flights only when you first set up a search and it changes the airports or dates you are looking for when you just try to go back

This used to be the best app out there! Now its confusing, garbage. Where once you are able to get tons of different flights at prices with different times of those flights but now it only offers you one flight.... the cheapest flight. Sometimes flying time is more important than price! Bring back the old sky scanner!

My tablet is not a phone and app rotates vertical, very anoying and counterproductive. Furthermore you used to be able to program in a widget that would at a glance show you price change of your desired trip and now you must dig for the information. Old saying goes, if its not broken don't fix it. This app was great but now the app sucks.

App keeps crashing on my OP6T. Every time I redirect to an affiliate to make a booking, I'm hindered by page freezes. I manage to complete a few pre-booking steps like fill up some forms and even got to the payment page once, but it just freezes on me inevitably. P.S. - I've cleared my cache.

it's the best search engine for flights and cars! Not that good for hotels, but for the rest is the number 1 I totally recommend it if you're planning a trip, you can get the best prices and it have very cool search options like going everywhere or to a specific country

Not sure your app is longer useful after the level of add-on the carriers have evolved making your fee comparisons no longer fit for purposes (you can compare an Iberia trip with a Ryanair because whilst in one you can bring your cabin trolley, in the second you can only place your two hands in pockets)...despite your disclaimers. Shame!

very comprehensive and helpful in finding various routes and apparently cheap options, yet it should include an explicit warning regarding self transfer with low cost carriers, those companies which frequently change hours and days (Ryanair for instance). Self transfer, especially with 2 stops, is a high risk on the verge of gamble when it depends on them.

I've been using this app for 8 years now. That was when I took my very first plane trip ever. I have become an avid traveler since then and I ALWAYS use Skyscanner to get my tickets because they always have the best prices by far. Even google and CheapOair are more expensive. It's been awesome to see this app grow and to also grow with it.

Terrible after sales support I had an airline cancel the flights due to Covid. Was supposed to get 100% refunded. I have accepted considerable charges from Sky Scanner evern though the cancellation had nothing to do with me. After 4 weeks I am still waiting to sort it out. They keep trying to add more fees that are unjustified and keep making excuses about the case being handled by managers. I buy atleast 50 tickets per year, these guys are quick to take your money. Good luck getting it back

Good app which I have used for a number of years. Don't like the new search interface. The older versions were much quicker to use. I want to select to, from and dates all on the same page without having to click to the next window.

What happened to the flight ratings??? I travel international very often and I used to love using this app, it was rating each flight based on price, length, layover, etc. which was amazing. Now I don't know whether that went! This is extremely dissatisfying and disappointing. Fix this ASAP or I'm deleting this app.

The app is not as good as the website, as it won't let you filter through destinations under the "Explore" feature until you actually choose a destination. I wish I could filter for non stop flights before choosing my destination!

This is horrible, my dates are flexible and am looking for the most convenient and cheaper flights. This is not available and the pricing shown on the calender doesn't correctly reflect when you tap on it. Such a disappointment

Would like to see a widget for home screen that can refresh and show "watched fares" for faster and more accessible flight watching. This app is great though. Just could be better with a widget instead if f waking up to a notification about price changes every day.

At first I was impressed but after 3 attempts at buying my ticket, each time without fail, rates hiked by nearly 100-125%. Really unfortunate as the app has a decent layout and easy to use Interface but the price hikes are enough to deter me from using the app to book flights.

The user experience on the app is soo bad. You can not set the filters before you search. I have to search first, guess Which days there are flights and then after the results appear, only then can I filter for direct only which removes all of the results so I have to start again. Do they not test these things?

Latest update doesn't allow to add all passengers before searching for flights. Only can add passengers if I click on particular flight. This issue needs changing, it's annoying. Other than that love the app and using it regularly.

Great concept, fails to execute. Saw Greece flights were from $676, spent days dreaming up our vacation, returned to see it still showed from $676, even showing the dates for that price. But alas when you click further, the cheapest flights are $936. That's too big of a difference to continue using the app.

App used to be very good. Have recently started using the app again to find a lot of the functionality has disappeared. Such as the sliding date graph to easily see which days have the cheapest flights. And the explore section is broken, not allowing me to pick any dates

Terrible experience. Even though you do find the cheapest flights, I was never able to pay for any of the options! I tried thousands of times through different sites and payment options but it always declined my cards (with enough funds) or told me the flight I wanted was sold out but then would show me the same flight after refreshing! Never using this app again.

Skyscanner used to be a good app. Multiple updates, though, have led to an inefficient interface. I'll never understand the need developers seem to feel to fiddle with things to make their apps worse than when they started. It's as though they don't understand how their users search for flights.

About 80% accurate. Does find you good deals, but not the best & most accurate; ultimately you need to search the official website of the airlines for final pricing. And you don't get refunds or any benefits from ordering tickets from 3rd party like Skyscanner.

Their new interface just does not work. Previously, I have been able to enter destination, dates, class etc all on the same screen. Now it requires multiple switches between screens, making it massive hassle

I would commit murder, the app deliberately defaults to the wrong date when you input information so that you turn up at the airport on the wrong date. It's done this on me 3 times and I feel it's deliberately done so you book more last minute flights at higher prices. today I lost 900 pounds. I've tested on three android devices and it did that same on all three. scum

wish it had a feature for a day range. means, setting up price alert for a range of day +2,3 so if a really good deal shows up within a couple of days before or after my target travel day, I may be able to make changes to my date and purchase the cheaper flights.

It is nice app. Searches wide variety of ticket provider and recommends better rates. Can you make one improvement- During flight search I always need to select the date. Can you provide next and previous date navigations. Say Im searching flight for 6 November and I don't find one suiting my choice then I can select next and previous and it shows data of 7 nov or 5 nov date and so on. Currently i have open the calendar select 7 Nov

It used to be a pretty decent app, 4 stars but in the past 2 month or so there is minimum 100¬£, discrepancies between the shown price on skyscanner and the amount that the ticket costs, often hundreds more, Its been so bad so long I started using other apps a lot more, and would recommend not using sky scanner till they sort themselves out

The prices are not updated until I click on a particular flight, so the initial price is very often wrong. And the cheapest option is not with the airline directly but with a third party, and it's a nightmare to book with any of them.

The best and the easiest way to find out best flight options and keep track of price fluctuations. i love this. I love the comfort of being able to see different flight and hotel options and plan my vacations. Thanks Skyscanner team! You guys rock!!

Such a shame. Skyscanner is an awesome service on web. Their app does not make searches easy and it's difficult to compare flights, especially in a whole month. I can't help but wonder what in the heavens they were going for here. Just terrible!

New interface is made so poorly, I think aviasales bought you to make it worse and dominate the market. It's either ultra counterintuitive to find or whole month and price graph options are missing, only coloured calendar that isn't obvious at all.

I'm loving it. I always use it to compare prices on tickets. 2022 edit: However, I don't love the fact that you block flights from and to Russia. Your political views are not of importance. Apparently I'll have to use other app to compare flights and actually flight to my home country (Greece) and maybe I'll stick to it. "Obligation" is an excuse in your case. "Flexibility" is the answer.

They have ruined the app, it's now so terrible, it's unusable. There was a way around it in the past by using your browser and not the app to access the site, now they have even ruined that. I am actively looking for alternatives to skyscanner now, again it's unusable.

Skyscanner is certainly my go to for any flight to anywhere every time. Like all good apps, it could be improved. 1. It is not possible to set filtering defaults. E.g if I will never fly with some airlines, I must remove them again with every search variation. 2. Multi flights are not handled well when added as a Trip. It is not possible to see the detail views of the flights. Instead the app tried to find updated prices for the originally selected class, but for only one pax an throws error.

Poor service from your Travelgenio Affiliate. They cancelled and rebooked my flight, so now I need to stay in the airport for 20 hours layover instead of 3hrs. I've tried to get in touch with them a couple of times but haven't gotten any response. Worse customer service and leaves me no good option.

Multi city option does not work when trying to book cabin class. if you try to book first of business, and just one of the flights doesn't have that option, it will say no flights available, instead of giving me the option to say yes to economy on that one short haul flight and first for the other flights.

It seems like this app is going further and further in the wrong direction. I hate the logo change and rebranding. Why do people feel the need to change things that are already good? The new logo is ugly and makes the app hard to find in my arsenal of travel apps. It used to stand out and be my go-to. The search results and navigation is totally off now and hard to use. Will likely start using the other apps more.

Absolute lifesaver in every possible way; really the best way to get cheap flights easily. I especially like their feature which allows you to choose a month/dates to travel in and it gives you the cheapest destination possible.

Utterly average. Found no advantage to using this app over any other, they're all exactly the same, present the same routes, omit the same airlines, etc. No unique functionality whatsoever. In the end I went to the airline websites directly and got better options and pricing.

Wanted to set up a price alert for a flight I need to book but is too expensive right now. Seems you can't save a flight alert through a normal flight search, you have to set up a trip. This is pretty unintuitive devs! Why can't I hit the bell icon for a flight I've found through the flight search?

App was working great, but today it will not let me input departure and return dates. When I input departure date the return date defaults to departure date... This is was resolved by reinstalling the app. So far all is good...!!!! So from I'll rate it a 5 instead of 2 stars..!!!

very intuitive, simple, planning a trip is much more easier with this app. would be great to also have trains and blablacar inside, to compare everything at the same time. The option from XXXXX to "everywhere" allows to spot last minute flights at a great price.

the update of price fluctuations is great, as are the 'explore everywhere' flights (although deals are often too short a period, sadly) but not as good, price wise, as before in comparison to other sites lately. However, Skyscanner will always be the first App I check.

This app is a waste of space. Can't even get the flights search page on as gets stuck on a black screen forever. Skyscanner you should know in this time and age, making an app this flawed available on the Play Store is hurting your rep. Get a decent product Dev/Assurance team. Switched to the website, hoping it won't crash...

This is a bad app, and I used it for years. Loved it. Since Dec 2019 it has lost all appeal. AC was shown as well as most other airlines departing YTO. Now??? 1. No AC, 2. it doesn't give me the "I am flexible " option 3. Keeps bugging me to sign in...

I used to love this app for its purpose and ease of use. But the latest UI is horrible, I swear. I am a frequent traveller and I always use Skyscanner to book my flights but I don't think I'll be continuing to use it any further. New update is making the UX so confusing. Please make changes.

Really easy to use. but more than that, it's reliable and often finds fare combinations that Kayak or Expedia could not. My favorite travel app so far. I managed to find a great business class fare with Austrian Airlines from Toronto to Tel Aviv, it was over $800 cheaper than the lowest prices option on Expedia! Good job Skyscanner, keep up the great work :)

I loved this app until they introduced their updated version now I just hate it! It's so frustrating to have to go in everytime and choose an airport that isn't my local one. And the dates auto fill, what's with that! Stop it! I want to pick when I go on holiday and it won't be next week!!!

New UX is a nightmare. Always picks the wrong starting city, no selection option for 'direct flights', sometimes I still get the good old UX but no idea how to get there. Really pushing for hotel bookings - feels like an alpha test release

Explore tab is now on there however I can't actually explore anythinf, also please remove the double covid travel tab. When I open app sometimes I get a duplicate of the covid travel map, I want to explore all available flights but doesn't always give me that option. Thank you.

I loved this app and used it all the time, but since the last update I absolutely hate it and give up using it everytime I give it another try! It used to be really easy to find cheap flights by comparing prices from day to day, but I can't do this anymore. And I spent 5 minutes just trying to figure out how to search for a return flight rather than one way, which is ridiculous. I always recommended this app to my friends and family, but definitely won't now. Please, please change it back!

Very good, but... Maybe you can add search by range of dates for direct travel. For example I want to fly 16 and I do not have a direct connection, but I already have 17. Now I have to look for every day, and I could mark from range to range. Departure from 16-19, return 28-30, I mark direct flights and decide what dates I am interested in. I reviewed you guys on the 16th of May 2018, i had nothing to write because I was happy with the service you provided. All the cheapest air fares from different agents under 1 roof that was awesome, i guess ignorance bliss i should have done a bit more research before purchasing my tickets from Tripsta which i did on 17th of May 2018 for a trip which i was travelling with my wife on the 22nd Aug 2018 from DXB to HRE, return flights on the 2nd Sept 2018 HRE to DXB . To cut a long story short we get to the check in desk of the airline and we told the tickets have been suspended by the agent Tripsta due to none payment this is an hour before boarding, I was shocked after hearing that i asked to see the supervisor, he said the same thing and he even took it a little further by asking us to come round the check in counter to show us on the system. We showed him all our emails from Tripsta and even a e'statement from the bank showing the online payment made plus the ticket sale receipt. I was advised to call the Tripsta toll free number which i did and it was fruitless it didn't even go through, I even had to call my Uncle in the wee hours of the morning based in UK to call the Tripsta toll free since its UK based agent and it didn't even go through to make it worse it gave us an alternative spanish number which didn't even go through. It was disheartening when We googled Tripsta and seeing all these bad review's about them, we had been planned for this 8 months in advance, so realising nothing could be done we ended up buying tickets from another agent at the airport which was expensive and we couldn't cancel our plans to go on holiday. We basically bought tickets twice and 1 set we didn't use due to we got scammed and used the other. So once we got back we tried contacting Tripsta asking for a refund and it was the same tune, no response from them. Isn't there a way to remove any of these fraudulent agents from your site or app because at the moment i wouldn't advise anyone who may ask me for my opinion to use your app. After a stream of bad reviews why do you still keep them on your App.

The new update is awful and frustrating. I miss being able to enter the search settings so only the relevant info will show. Now it's just confusing. Also, seeing the prices for the hole month was very helpful to help selecting the cheapest day to travel. I can't find that now!! I see no improvements, all the good stuff is gone and new stuff is just confusing. I have given a 2 star only because the idea of this app is very useful for me as far as flights are concerned. I don't understand why this app felt the need to add car hire and hotels. There are a lot of apps for that in the market and this app should focus more on what it is good at.  Thank you for your reply. I had already found the chart days but is not as easy as you describe. You have to select the days at the beginning of the search. Then search. Then select the days again and only then the chart icon will appear. It's confusing. Also you need to select the "direct flights only" option on every single search which is ver annoying. Lastly i feel that the generalised "search by country" (to check the cheapest airports in the contry) is not working properly and i had to check each departing airport to each destination airport which is very time consuming if those countries have 4 ou 5 airports each. This becomes an even bigger problem if you want to return by a diferente airport that might be cheaper.  Multy airport search is still a nightmare! Alerts have stop working properly. It now shows all flights including flights with stops and change in prices are shown for the cheapest flight even though they do not interest me. I would like to be able to add an alert for a specific flight at the time of my choosing otherwise this function is useless. Also if the app can remember your preferred settings for all searchers would be a massive improvement rather then changing it every time. Also i cant select the dates i want in multy search mode, it only shows me the cheapest dates for the next 3 months but if i want to fly in august i cant select any flights, so this is also useless. These 3 items used to work well in the past but it seems worst with recent updates.

This app would be amazing if the prices advertised were real prices. Half

I am a fan of Skyscanner and have been raving about them for YEARS! They

cheapest way to get to Europe and then search for cheap flights on smaller 
carriers to get to my final destination. I have not seen any other company 
offering anything like it!

The reason for 2 stars is allot of the travel companies are semi scam companies. They use bait and switch pricing and I was frustrated at the time I had to spend researching sham companies. Use trip advisor and a private browser tab for best results. That way the website doesn't know who you are and won't inflate the price because it knows who you are. They track your searches and increase prices over time. That trick saved me $80. Same search very different prices!

This app is fine if you know exactly when and where you want to go but one of the things that makes Skyscanner so good is the ability to search within a whole month and compare flights on different days within that month. The app allows you to search by month, but then limits process to only the cheapest. If you can't make that date, you're stuck because you can't see any others without searching them all individually. How many people have a completely free choice of date within a month? Or the time to search every combination of outward and return dates one by one? It does show cheapest process in the immediate future but no good for booking a summer holiday months ahead.

So I came to a frustrating plateau in my first time ever to shop for plane tickets and I possibly picked the worst season of the year to find "affordable flights" - Christmas! Nights of searching and planning how best to plan our flights, I found the prices jumped higher in price with every click of the search button. I tried a few websites such as Kayak and Travelocity and was so confused and frustrated by the lackluster of numbers, times, dates and compared costs on my 15" laptop screen, that could barely hold in view the spew of information, until I found Skyscanner! This app has alleviated my first ticket buying experience from hair pulling to "oh that was easy". The interface is nice, they list out everything clearly and give hints as to what's a good deal or has a horribly long lay over. If you are new or seasoned alike at buying plane tickets I would recommend this app in your arsenal. To the developers - great job, my only real complaint is the filter ability and the way it organizes times. I found that some better times, for me personally, were lower in the list with a "lesser" rating but still way easier than any online site I used.

I was beyond distracted when trying to book a  simple one way, Krabi to Bangkok. Thai Lion Air kept refusing my payment. Air Asia was overpriced. I looked at a few blogs and one guy mentioned skyscanner. It worked like a charm, and didnt send me to an airline site that charges you for every little thing. It got me Thai Airlines for less than $40 per person flying into BKK, which is great,  so now I can just take the airport rail link right into town and get to my Silom hotel quickly using the MRT and BTS, instead of flying me to the commuter airport DMK which I would have had to take a bus for half an hour just to get to the  MRT, to avoid the cab ride I had last time that cost $30 because the driver took the long way, over one hour,  in midtown after work traffic. I wish that I knew about Skycanner a long time ago, because it gave me the best price for the best airline at the best airport location at a rate one would usually pay for with a low cost airline using a promo! Aloha and mahalo to everyone at Skyscanner, for saving my sanity and getting me a great ticket  when it just couldn't be done.

Excellent tool for finding flights easy to understand and as a traveller I always use Skyscanner to plan my next flight.  Now the bad! Always clear your cookies if you return to Skyscanner for the same ticket.  Skyscanner uses cookies to track your browsing, you will notice that the more you use the app the price goes up!   This is to encourage you to purchase the ticket based on fear of loss!  So my advice is always clear your cookies before using/returning to  the app as it will go up in price.

Two stars FOR THE APP only.  Skyscanner on a browser is fantastic and I absolutely love it, clear concise listings, great design, great search filters, great choices for results output, outstandingly useful TOP FIVE WEBSITE.  Then they let a toddler design the app, I wanty big pikuchures an punchy buttons wahhh, resulting (on a wide search) in stupid blocky pop results text cat-scratched onto pointless pictures that lack any information and blur the words you want to read, chronicly ill thought out formatting.  I have no idea at all why this crayon collage got past QC.  There is a reason roads are not an arrangement of randomly shaped and sized multicoloured frilly blocks with lamp posts made of jelly - adults like to see where they are going quickly and efficiently with all options re. traffic and alternative routes clearly marked.  If you really want pointless frills and pretties put em round the edge!  Out of the way of the information, where embellishments belong. I repeat, I love skyscanner, but blimey, sorry about the rant.

It's a good app but some features that would make your life even easier are not implemented yet:  1. When you watch a flight, a reminder of the price change would be nice. There is a reminder for the prices available for the routes from all the carriers but after you've chosen the flight you want, you're not interested in the rest as much.  2. When you watch a flight, it would be nice to see the updated price directly there for all your watched flights. As it's implemented now, you need to click each one to see the new price... After you exit it, the price still doesn't update (bug).  3. It would be nice to see price alerts that display price updates and include the filters you created e.g. if I want a max of 1 stop or a certain hour to fly out, it would be nice to be notified about price changes for those with my filters only, not for a flight with 2 stops being cheaper.  I hope a product owner will see my review and request these changes to be implemented, thus making the app even more useful than it is now.

I have been using the website and app for years and just updated as the old version stopped working.  What a disappointment! The old version had all the data and just how I needed it. The pictures now added are of no use and I want to look at a month as a whole and not lots of disjointed dates of the cheapest and next cheapest. Why change something that works well already? I will continue with it for a while but looks like I will have to use the desktop version instead which was OK last time I checked.

As a long time veteran user of Skyscanner, I have recommended it to a vast number of my traveller friends and family. However, whilst I still recommend the Web version, the app is redundant. I need to have the same features on the app as I do on the website. I need to be able to do everywhere any time searches. The app just seems useless to anyone looking for cheap holidays at assorted times of the year. Also, the explore section is absolutely dreadful, I like on the Web how you click a destination and then the airports drop down, you select one and a list of airports from the departure country drop down. The app is completely unusable, please please please release the old app. I really like the Skyscanner team, their website is fantastic and they have enabled me to travel much more, but please roll back this app. At least list an apk archive online.

Used to love this app, but the new user interface renders it pretty much unusable. Whoever designed it clearly never tried to search for flights. I always do multiple searches often from/to different airports and having to go back multiple pages to update a search parameter is just ridiculous. In addition it now gives you idiotic notifications for flights you previously searched for and no way to switch them off. Total lack of respect for users!

I loved the old version simple and effective. User had choice to pick cheapest fare from the calendar but now it's only estimated fare if I want now the price I have select every single day which is time consuming. There is no option to select the multiple cities it only give two city option. Please add old feature of exact price no estimate. Add multiple city option. Thank you

Easy to search, buy tickets, and daydream about flying somewhere. BUT, I really miss radome flights search option that they did away with a few updates ago. I loved the ability to see how much a flight to Barbados, or Greenland, or Newark were just encase I had that extra money to burn for a random ticket some where. It honestly was my favorite feature of the app. If they bring it back it will be the top travel app, hands down.

Was much better when it was flights only. I loved where I could check my flexible dates with the bar graph for the month. Now it is just like any other travel search app. If this feature still exists then I rate it the same because it's user friendliness just went down.

Perfect example of how a good user experience can be damaged through updates. It used to be great, now it's just another app with unintuitive layout. I used to display prices for the whole month, now I don't even know if it's possible. Really disappointing new interface.

I like the "anywhere" destination option which shows you the cheapest flights from a particular airport. you have removed the monthly view option,which judging by the other reviews, and common sense, was the feature that your customers wanted.  also return flights are now limited to weekends, 3 to 5, or 5 to 7 days.  what if I want to go for more than a week? terrible upgrade to a once fine app

This app was famous because of its core functionalities like the month view graph or the more famous chart view tab. People simply had been using that to book their best flights in advance and now it's gone again. Shame!

It worked so nicely a couple years ago when I started using it... what a shame...

I've never left a review of an app until now, but I feel compelled to express my frustration that a 5 star app turned into a 1 star app in one update.

This version is terrible. UI is very clumsy. The dates selected don't seem to be saved when checking flights to possible destinations so you have to keep re-selecting them over and over. For users who know their exact destination, maybe this is OK, but for those frequently selecting flights to Everywhere, this app is disappointing. It's easier to manually search your destinations using Kayak now.

It was previously very easy to see prices at a glance far in advance. which would allow for easily planning trips. Now it's time consuming and you have to choose date and cross your fingers that it is the lowest price since it's just a green dot to tell you you're within a "fair price range" now. When using the bar option it's no better, you have to seek out the lowest bar visually. It doesn't give you a "hint price" with a line extended as it previously did.

Please please bring back the previous version! I used to love and use  skyscanner exclusively (we are on year 2 of rtw travel) but this update has been extremely painful to use. I've figure out how to see it but because the calendar is the default view I always have to press it which is annoying. Please tell your developers to allow this preference to be saved in the next update, I think it will make a lot of your users happy who prefer the old search. Thanks!

I use this app on a daily basis & I honestly think that you should just downgrade back to the former version. It was much simpler, quick, & user friendly. But now too many useless images with complicated interface. Though this app will always be my favorite, absolutely love it.

I found a flight through Expedia for an amazing price on the app, but when I went to cross-check it on the website, the flight wasn't listed. I know this app gives you the option to book the flight from your phone, but it felt way too sketchy for me. I also needed to look for a multi-city flight, but it seems that's not an option.

New version doesn't let you select flight times as easily & search results are full of horrid 4am red eye flights.  Screens are cluttered. Pushes you to select country then airport rather than jump straight to airport. Was my previous default flight search engine will probably go elsewhere now.

I use this app very frequently and have done for many years.  I find the updated version much more effort to use.  Instead of being able to put your search data in on one page,  it's now a series of around 5 pages. So time consuming. It's turned from a great simple,  quick app, to an overly complicated one with too many superfluous steps.

The search results display is horrible. Expedia's list of flights shows the airports that the flights connect to, which makes it much easier to focus on OPEN airports (versus SkyScanner's method of requiring that I click on each result to see the connecting airports). Sure, it isn't a frequent need, but IS a need nonetheless.

I have been using this app for long time. A very helpful app but the the latest update is bad. Two issues:  1. Even I select the direct flight option in the start date and return date, the search result still displays all results. I need to click the filter again in order to display the direct flight only.  2. The second one is more annoying issue. In the older version, I was able to see all prices around my planned dates by clicking the Chart symbol. In the latest version, I only see the price of particular date I have selected in the Chart. In order to locate if there is any cheaper tickets around my planned date, I have to click each date around my date manually to see the pop up price. I would prefer to view prices around my planned date without clicking each date. Is there any way I can install the previous version of this app.   3. The Chart symbol only exists in the start and return date screen instead of existing on the result screen. I would prefer to see the Chart symbol exists in both screens which is a more efficient way to locate cheaper tickets.4. On Skyscanner website, why there is no Chart function which allows users to view prices around planned date?

This app is good to get the estimate price for the flights, but be aware that it might not be the price charged to you in the end.

Nothing but headaches. I have used it twice to make reservations. First time, I had to re-book with the airline, since the reservation hadn't actually been made, and the confirmation number I had wasn't recognizable by the airline's system.  Second time, I was trying to make reservations for two people, leaving on different flights and returning on the same flight. Very difficult to even do this, then even worse to get the payment through their system. Received an email indicating that the flight had not been booked, so called their support number, and was told the flight had been booked, even though the credit card authorization they said was necessary never had been given. After about three and a half hours on the phone, reservations were made. Have now renamed this app Skyscammer,  and removed it. Never again.

I gave this app a great rating a week ago, but trying to book a flight during the past week has changed my view completely!  My "slight moan" that the headline price is not available when you go to specific airport details is now a huge disatisfier - in my experience, the headline price is rarely, if ever available!  I also experienced many occasions when, despite completing all the search criteria, I was presented with flights that were not available, or with an insufficient number of tickets available to match my needs (problems in this regard with Delta Airlines especially). Found Gotogate much more reliable after being directed there by Skyscanner,  so will use that in future.

I rarely rate apps, but feel the need to thank the creators of this one. My wife and I are headed to Costa Rica, and for weeks had used the app to track prices. We had settled on paying between 1350 and 1500 for both of us. Woke up last Saturday, checked the app, and an unbelievable $977 popped up! I booked it right away, and can now afford a camera to take down with us. Thanks so much!

The app is great, allowing you to compare flights as of the previous hour. The widget is great too, as it allows you to easily see prices for a flight you are interested in right from your home screen. In terms of improvement, I would suggest 4 things:  First, the fact that you can make "favorite" flights is awesome, but it doesn't save filters that you put on that search. So right now, by having a flight a "favorite," it'll remember the dates and destinations, but not any time filters I'd like to have. Secondly, they should have functionality for routine flights -- e.g. if I fly from Airport A to Airport B every Monday-Wednesday, it'd be nice to have a feature that will save that regular, routine trip week by week. Third, I don't know if it has this already, but there should be an alert system whereby you set a particular price and when prices drop below that, the app alerts you so that you can go ahead and buy at that price. Fourth (and this is a stretch), they should let you log prices day by day so that you can see airline prices for a particular "favorite" over the course of time. This will help in determining when prices are cheapest/most expensive

Current version appears to have resolved earlier issues. Now works exactly as one would expect.  Request: enter your start and end point (not necessarily airports), it gives a list of "best routes" taking into account time, cost, number of changes etc. The weighting algorithm could be customisable.

Utter rubbish now since they allowed third parties,was way better when it was direct with airline.  My daughter booked flights via Skyscanner, trip was cancelled within 24 hours, if she had booked directly with BA she would have had a full refund.  This lot she booked with took the whole ¬£490 saying it was non refundable.  So she is now out of pocket of almost ¬£500, and in tiny letters the company wasn't even atol protected.  Will go back to searching for flights the old fashioned way, but beware and read carefully if you are directed to a third party.  Shame on you Skyscanner what you had was good, not anymore.

Overall, it's not too bad.  If you fly from a major airport on a major airline, then this is for you.  I've used it twice to book a good deal.  Frontier in December 13, traveling from PHX to IAH; then in February 14 for a March trip via Allegiant from AZA to PSC.  Between then and now, somehow the app no longer allows me to use AZA, or Allegiant as an option for travel.  Like I said, app works well, but it's getting a bad rating, due to the previous capability that is no longer provided & bad customer supp.

Today's upgrade is a catastrophe:  1. For about 2/3 of dates tested, Skycanner returned NO FLIGHTS even for major market city-pairs; 2. System takes 3 TIMES (!) as long to research and return results as previously, even when "NO FLIGHTS" is returned; 3. You return flights on only ONE of FIVE carriers providing nonstops in the DEN-CHI market, and only ONE of SIX carriers operating nonstop betwwen DEN and NYC, as examples.  Something went BADLY WRONG with rev.  Suggest you immediately revert to prior rev.
